comments: I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

I like it! Certain levels were so challenging to beat in Expert Mode I thought it was impossible. But with some patience you can solve it! (With the exception of Houston U-4 how do you beat that in 46 moves lol)
I don,t have the words to say about the game but only one problem of this game ads always on. The top of the screen

This game has alot of benefits, especially, the decision making, plan ahead, multi tasking, pattern recognition and many more. Thank to this game, its very addictive, plain and simple, make you relax and it doesnt stress. Deserve to be 5 star.
Cool I like the complexity of it, it isn't always too easy. But I would like a 'reset' option so I don't have to drag the arrows back every time I go wrong
The controls can sometimes be a little weird, but other then that everything is perfect. It's just a really good game in general. The animation is so adorable.

descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.


This is how you do it:

🤔 Draw routes for your truck drivers
🎁 Make sure that every house receives the correct package
▶️ Press play
🚚💨 Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!


Features:

✓ 400 FREE levels
✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
✓ Beautiful graphics
✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!


★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★


Available In-App purchases:

PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑
★ The premium version of RGB Express
★ Removes ads
★ Supports game development and future updates

HINTS 🤯
★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
recentChanges: - A new challenge: Mirror mode! Another perspective to solve the puzzles  [Complete 100 levels to unlock mirror mode]
- Expert Mode par values are now tougher on some levels!  [Complete 200 levels to unlock Expert Mode]
- Improved tutorials to help new players
summary: Easy to learn puzzle game with a serious challenge for puzzle game fans!
title: RGB Express

comments: My game is literally unplayable right now. For about a week now, it has randomly just lagged out and would take 5 seconds for every action to actually take place. Now, when i boot up the game, it just freezes when i click on anything. My shop tries to open but just goes to a black screen and freezes. I will try to play for a few more days, but if i cant play by the end of the weekend, i will be deleting the game.

What is wrong with the newest update? I can't acquire my item from the switch shop. Every time I click on get item, the black screen goes to the top left of the screen. And I can see the normal background picture. When that happens I have to close the game and reset. I've tried to get the item 20 times and it does that every time.

Was a great game til the update. Now I have to open it twice for my energy to update and for the money in the pawn shop to change. Also when I bargain with clients now it's alway a negative profit compared to before. More annoying then anything

Make it more exciting. Also you open the building that say they will finish construction soon because the game gets boring if there no excitement added to it.

I enjoy playing this game. Currently I have two major problems with it.  1. I wish I could change orientation based on how my phone is tilted.  2. I tried to have Mutt trade something really expensive and now it freezes every time I attempt to open the trade.

descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description: Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet‚Äôs Settings.
descriptionHTML:
Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!

Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.

Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!

However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.

- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.

- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.

- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.

- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!

- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.

Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.
recentChanges: Full storage? Now you can sell dishes, ingredients and items instantly, right from your storage!
This update also includes technical improvements and some polishing to make your town even tastier!
summary: Manage it all from the farm to the kitchen to build your dream restaurant!
title: Tasty Town

comments: The game has gorgeous graphics. Each scene is very detailed and fun to play. Some are a little difficult to get through if you like to keep your brightness low like me and some items are incredibly tiny to find. But it has a fun premise and it's a pretty good time waster. However, you can't play for long. Each play takes 20 energy and it goes by quickly. Waiting for it to refill takes a long time. Getting stars to solve cases also takes some time. It's basically the wait time in this game that kinda kills it.

This is a really enjoyable game, especially for fans of HP and/or the fantasy genre. The graphics are beautiful and the characters look so real. I just wish energy wasn't used up so quickly. At 20 points of energy a pop you can't really play for long, and the XP needed to level up is also high so you usually have to wait for the energy to refill. Also, when you level up you don't get a complete energy refill; you only get about half. Waiting time to complete tasks is also too high IMO. At least a couple of hours if not longer. With any other game this is usually enough to turn me off but the gameplay, the story and the graphics are so good that I'm willing to exercise a lot of patience.

Beautiful hidden object experience. Offers a variety of gameplay including mirrored levels, timed levels, and spot the differences. The Facebook connection is there without being thrown in your face like some other games and is a nice subtle addition. It does work off of energy however I am willing to stick it out just for the storyline.

It's a good game but having to wait so long for the energy build up takes away the excitement of the game play. Iv noticed alot of other game users have the same outlook on this game. Even the timers for tasks take way to long.. 6 hours to complete? Really? Why so long? People will get bored and find another stimulating game. This is based on the whole wizarding world so it should be alot more magical and less time consuming.

Love the game overall but it takes way too long to build up energy. Because of this you are only able to play for very short periods of time before you have to wait for the energy to build back up. Also some of the 'inspection' actions take way too long. Waiting 6+ hours for an action to be completed is excessive. I would love to be able to play the game for more than just a couple of minutes a day. I realize it is done to encourage people to make in app purchases, however, perhaps you could provide a paid version of the app to avoid this. I love the game and would love to be able to play it more.

Love this game, but it has only 14 cases!! WTH?? The last case acted like you were going on to another one, but no. Feel like it shouldn't have been released with only 14 cases. Very similar to Criminal Case in a lot of ways. The upgrades help a lot, but it takes a while before you notice their effect and cost is too high, IMO.

Otherwise great game.

description: Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!STYLINGStyling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.DRIVER'S SKILLSUpgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.TUNINGYou are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.DRIVING PHYSICSIt's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!
descriptionHTML:
Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!

STYLING

comments: Pretty good for finding it on Facebook. I'm liking it so far, but there's no tutorial or anything like it, so you're on your own figuring things out. Some item descriptions aren't in English, and the text after you gain things in combat for gold and souls goes too fast. Still don't know what it's saying.   Would recommend though just for a quick thing to do when you're bored and have time to kill.

A hidden gem. Premium currency is handed out in enough amounts to buy important things. Easy enough to figure out but a lack of a tutorial could turn away some. Only reason I took a star away because musketeer class line has high dex and str scaling skills..??

A surprising find, i really don't expected this game to have this level of quality. This game successfully give me the feeling of discovery and exploration while in expeditions, and i feel compelled to build and better the manor. But a disappointment is how there are no differences between characters other than their classes and aesthetics.

This game is great takes a little wile to figure out but it is no way a pay to play you have the option to buy gems that help u acheive things faster. Its not much of a grind either to acheive things that are less common with that said the classes are somewhat confusing finding the correct skill set and play style can be hard

What a surprising good game, somehow it manages to keep me up logging at it daily to train my heroes and do some quest, a thing that would be really amazing would be cloud support, so you can play the same savefile on two devices, didnt found any game breaking bugs and so far the game didnt pushed the shop into me which was nice. All in all a 4.5 out of 5. Can t wait to see this game evolve and age.

Great game. Fresh. I've read a bunch of reviews saying that the game is surprisingly good and I was still surprised how good it was. There is room for improvement naturally but the great combination of familiar and innovative will leave me playing the game for quite a while.

descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.

descriptionHTML:
Your friends – fluffy kitten Kiki and adorable puppy Fifi – are inviting you to their new adventures at Royal Pet Hotel. Have fun while exploring the hotel and taking care of your virtual animal guests!

There is no time to be bored! Decorate Pet Hotel and design the most amazing reception desk. Help puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room. Unpack Fifi’s clothes, shoes and accessories, and style her bag. Don’t forget to feed Fifi when she is hungry! You can find her favorite dishes at the Hotel Café: pizza, doughnuts and juice cocktails!

Play pet style makeover in Kiki’s room, and create the perfect hair and makeup look. Take care of baby tiger Lili while she is taking a bath. Shop for stylish clothes and accessories for all animal friends, and feel free to ask cute fluffy hotel staff for help!

Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel fun little games for kids:
· Style and decorate Reception to your own taste!
· Help little puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room!
· Unpack Fifi’s clothes and design her travel bag!
· Dry and comb Kiki’s beautiful hair and do her makeup!
· Help tiger Cara to take care of her baby Lili: bath her and style her hair!
· Feed Fifi yummy lunch at the Café!
· Dress up Kiki, Fifi, Cara and Lili in the most amazing outfits at the Fashion Shop!
· Call Reception if you have troubles – cute bunnies are ready to help you!
· Play Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel game every day and collect rewards!
· Watch videos and get extra coins for new game items!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. comments: Everything was great except in the beginning it kept saying I didn't find any mice but I found them twice on the first one.. but then I restarted it and it worked fine.. until it kept freezing and I had to restart my tablet.. after doing that like 5 times it worked great thru out the whole game.. I kinda felt like it was a lot shorter then the other games. But other then that I had fun playing it and I'm super excited for other to come out so hurryyy!!!!!!! Lol

This is just like the other game you guys made, the one with the doctor in the hospital, down to the exact same thing of "play the first couple of levels for free but if you like you pay" I bet this one is for the same price. On a side note, the story is different but the game play is the same, go have a look if you want. I will say this is a good game and I take nothing away from the hard work you have done. Good looking graphics, good smooth game play. A game you can get into and do try the other games of this developers you may like it as well. Over all a good game I just do not think it is worth $15. But best of luck guys.

I absolutely love this game. However I had to order a new phone due to mine being replaced for insurance purposes and I was logged into my Facebook and lost all my progress and the app is NOW wanting me to repay. I don't wanna have to pay another 9.99. If there's anyway I can get my game back.
I would rate higher but it's says I haven't found any mice.  But I always find them twice each level and it says mouse found when I click on it.  It's frustrating.

I've bought nearly most of these games and this one has disappointed me most. When I finish a level it won't actually finish so I have to keep restarting it. Also some of the bonus levels are hard to understand what I'm supposed to do. I don't know if it's a bug but it's kinda annoying. Apart from the bug, just like the Delicious games etc it's great. Just need to fix the bugs :)

This refuses to let me log into Facebook and everytime I try to click on the camera to give to one of the agents it freezes and the character won't even walk over to the camera I love GameHouse games but this one is glitching so bad please fix it

descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa
recentChanges: We‚Äôve made a few minor text adjustments to make it easier to solve the case
summary: Are you ready to solve the case and bring a criminal to justice? ‚öñÔ∏è üïµÔ∏è‍‚ôÄÔ∏è
title: Parker & Lane: Criminal Justice

comments: Great game! I really love it and its great to play when you want to pass through time. My only issue i have is that my upgrades are so high that i go over the side barrier almost every time. I feel it would be awsome if, like bats, you could unlock new balls. Also, online leaderboards would be awesome, so we can see who holds the current record.

One thing is bombarding everyone with ads, another is: 1. There is no sound whatsoever. 2. The whole purpose of the game is getting a new bat.  3. There is no point of hitting it down the middle because it will hit something and bounce back thousands of feet.  Overall this game sucks! About the ads?  I've learned 1 thing: If you see a game on an ad? When you download that game, it will be flooded with ads. That's just how that works...

The game is awesome but there are way to many ads between pitches. Cmon man!! I get it u want to make money.. So how much does it cost to have an ad free Baseball Boy? I feel like 99 cents would reasonable. Cause everyone would buy it just to not be annoyed by the stupid ads!! üòò

Bloody adds. Relax with the adds. There way way way way way way way you too many adds. Every time you play you gotta wait for an add to finish. It's disgusting. Whats the world coming too. Rather pay a dollar and have no adds. You guys messed up big time by making this an add flogging game. Hang your self's from a tree by your throat. Hope you get cancer.

The makers of this game deserve to be robbed of their anal virginity by Satan himself. Why should I be spending nearly twice as much time watching ads as I am playing the game? This is an ad revenue app, not a game. This does not deserve to be called a game. To get around watching ads, close the app and restart it. You'll skip the ad, but you'll still be spending more time reloading the game than actually playing it. To whomever made this game, I hope your kids become drug addicts and you die alone

Great game there are ads but I would rather have ads to get double coins some people get pissed off with ads how do you except developers to improve the games with out ads cause other companies pay them to have them. So overall it's great game good time killer and easy to play

comments: As others have said, the longer you play, the worse it performs and the more space it takes up, and after a while ads start causing the game to crash. However I've managed to get around it by reinstalling every couple of weeks. Other than that it's a good little game.

It's a pretty fun game, better than I thought it would be. There is one problem, you don't really need to buy "Flooz", but if you do. The prices are a little outrageous. Like 5$ for 100 Flooz, seems a little money hungry. And 100 Flooz for 15 days is 29$ is outrageous as well. I've played other games with better things to do besides upgrading and usually 100 "diamonds" of anything would last 30 and would cost 10-15$. Seems like you're trying to rip people off. Besides the money hungry creators, good game to kill time.

It has bugs. Like how sometimes skills don't activate right away, and on rare occasions, not at all. The currencies are pretty fair; I don't feel like have to buy anything (sucks for the devs, but it's not like I can buy anything even if I wanted to). Events keep the game fresh, and I always feel like I have something to do at all times, so it does a good job of keeping me occupied for 20-30 minutes at a time.

The first idle game that caught my attention. At first, i thought that it's just "one of those idle games".. But, the more I play the more i get hooked because of unique game mechanics. I might give this 5 stars in the future.

I think the game would be enjoyable if it did not crash ALL the time. Get to a new level? Crash. Watch a video? Crash. Crash Them All might be a more fitting name for the only game that has ever crashed more than once on this phone.

Incredible game play it for hours and love it soooo much only good things to say other than server connecting but it's no big deal love the game the style the graphics the game play is all awsome I do have some ideas for the game if your interested number one being adding carnivore and herbivore types into the game so you could have dinosaurs and number 2 is world bosses were the entire community can all defeat one boss and 3 to have the ability to friend people not through Facebook. Love the game it's so good thanks for putting so much hard work into it and adding awsome features cheers

description: Do you want to learn how to play the mystical Indian percussion? Improve your technique with the best app experience. From the same developer of REAL DRUM, REAL GUITAR, REAL PERCUSSION and FUNK BRASIL. Meet TABLA: The best and most complete free Android app on Google Play.Super simple to use! The app simulates a real Indian percussion kit on the screen of your phone/tablet. To play, you simply touch your fingers on the pads and the sound of the instrument plays simultaneously. A fun, easy-to-use and lightweight application. Ideal for anyone who wants to study or play percussion without making too much noise or taking up too much space.Tabla is a Hindu percussion musical instrument, widely used in India, usually in devotional or meditative music. Also known as Arabic percussion, darbukkah, darbouka or dumbak.You also do not need to know how to play Tabla! The app comes with 10 rhythm lessons with a tutorial for you to learn to play. Also comes with 9 super cool loops to play together like: Sarod, Sitar and Tanpura. And even lets you keep track of the music live.Made for drummers, percussionists, professional musicians, amateurs or beginners. Easy to use! Play anytime and test your skill with a super real set!Check out the details TABLA APP:- Exclusive Multitouch- 12 pads- Studio Audio Quality- 10 examples of super fun rhythms with tutorial- 9 styles of super loops to play along- Recording mode- High fidelity percussion kit- Export your MP3 recordings- Works in all screen resolutions - Mobiles and Tablets (HD Images)- Free Application- Easy to use- Simple handling- Make a HIT and become a legend!- Touch & play!        LEARN WITH THE TUTORIALSWe are musicalizing the world! It is super easy to learn how to play the lessons from the Tabla. Just follow the tips. Let's go to the courts:- Touch the blue icon (play), then choose the lessons tab and choose a lesson.- Touch the purple icon and in seconds the tutorial starts. Look on the screen for "Listen" as the original rhythm being played.- When the "Start" was shown, touch the pink pads and follow the lesson. Good luck!EXCLUSIVE MULTITOUCHWith differentiated gameplay our super pads allow you to play multiple instruments at the same time without any audio lag. Come on! Touch & play!SUPER LOOPSPlay along with 9 fun and simple super loops. Instruments like Sarod, Sitar and Tanpura for a more realistic percussion experience.TEST YOUR TALENTCome on and play with the most complete free mystical and magic Android app for mobile. Join one of Tabla's biggest fan communities. Show your talent for friends and family. Have millions of fans around the world.        The app is free, but you can remove all ads by purchasing a license!        Try the best and most complete Indian percussion! The simplest app of Google Play to use!

Tabla is a Hindu percussion musical instrument, widely used in India, usually in devotional or meditative music. Also known as Arabic percussion, darbukkah, darbouka or dumbak.

You also do not need to know how to play Tabla! The app comes with 10 rhythm lessons with a tutorial for you to learn to play. Also comes with 9 super cool loops to play together like: Sarod, Sitar and Tanpura. And even lets you keep track of the music live.

description: Epic Puzzle Action RPG for PACIFIC RIM fans!Command your own Shatterdome base and defend your district with human-piloted mechs called Jaegers against monsters from the breaches known as Kaiju.‚òÖ RECRUIT iconic Jaeger mechs from the entire PPDC to join your Strike Groups stationed at your Shatterdome.‚òÖ UPGRADE Jaeger mechs with new tech and weaponry to enhance their damage on the battlefield.‚òÖ EXTERMINATE enormous Kaiju monsters hell-bent on destroying Earth in fast-paced battles that can be completed in minutes.‚òÖ COMPETE with other players in Multiplayer Tournaments to win rewards for your Shatterdome and Jaeger Strike Groups.‚òÖ JOIN FORCES with other Marshals to form Factions and compete in War Games for prizes.THE STORY:Born into a world at war, you join the military and quickly ascend to the rank of Marshal in the Pan Pacific Defense Corps. 21 countries across the Pacific Rim have banded together to create the PPDC and fight the most dangerous foe mankind has ever seen: KAIJU. These giant alien behemoths have come to Earth via dimensional Breaches and will not stop until the human race is exterminated.As a Marshal, you along with teams of human pilots from around the world take control of a team of military robots known as JAEGERS using a mental synergy called Drifting. The only way to stop the Kaiju threat is to amass and outfit the most powerful array of Jaegers possible and send the Kaiju back through the Breach!FEATURES:ACESSIBLE, STRATEGIC GAMEPLAYEndlessly challenging, enjoyable core gameplay where players mix Jaeger power with puzzle strategy.TONS OF SINGLE-PLAYER CONTENTWage war against the Kaiju in an EPIC single player campaign featuring hundres of unique battles against over 25 different Kaiju monsters.DAILY MISSIONSMissions add to the fun and adventure as you work to compete objectives for your Shatterdome base.PVP JAEGER BATTLESTake your strongest Jaegers into simulation battles against the best teams of other players.COLLECTION & CUSTOMIZATIONOver 50 unique Jaegers can be collected and upgraded in many different ways. Combine them into Strike Groups to battle against impossible odds.MULTIPLAYER & CO-OPCompete alone or join a Faction in ranked, multiplayer leagues. Chat with other members of your Faction to share strategies.NOTE: A network connection is required to play.Get the latest news, feature updates, videos, tips, and more!Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pacrimgameLike us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pacrimgameWatch us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pacrimgame/Subscribe at: http://bit.ly/KFFYouTube
descriptionHTML:
Epic Puzzle Action RPG for PACIFIC RIM fans!

Command your own Shatterdome base and defend your district with human-piloted mechs called Jaegers against monsters from the breaches known as Kaiju.

★ RECRUIT iconic Jaeger mechs from the entire PPDC to join your Strike Groups stationed at your Shatterdome.

★ UPGRADE Jaeger mechs with new tech and weaponry to enhance their damage on the battlefield.

★ EXTERMINATE enormous Kaiju monsters hell-bent on destroying Earth in fast-paced battles that can be completed in minutes.

★ COMPETE with other players in Multiplayer Tournaments to win rewards for your Shatterdome and Jaeger Strike Groups.

★ JOIN FORCES with other Marshals to form Factions and compete in War Games for prizes.

THE STORY:
Born into a world at war, you join the military and quickly ascend to the rank of Marshal in the Pan Pacific Defense Corps. 21 countries across the Pacific Rim have banded together to create the PPDC and fight the most dangerous foe mankind has ever seen: KAIJU. These giant alien behemoths have come to Earth via dimensional Breaches and will not stop until the human race is exterminated.

As a Marshal, you along with teams of human pilots from around the world take control of a team of military robots known as JAEGERS using a mental synergy called Drifting. The only way to stop the Kaiju threat is to amass and outfit the most powerful array of Jaegers possible and send the Kaiju back through the Breach!

FEATURES:

ACESSIBLE, STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
Endlessly challenging, enjoyable core gameplay where players mix Jaeger power with puzzle strategy.

TONS OF SINGLE-PLAYER CONTENT
Wage war against the Kaiju in an EPIC single player campaign featuring hundres of unique battles against over 25 different Kaiju monsters.

DAILY MISSIONS
Missions add to the fun and adventure as you work to compete objectives for your Shatterdome base.

PVP JAEGER BATTLES
Take your strongest Jaegers into simulation battles against the best teams of other players.

description: Space Rabbits in Space is an award winning, fully-fledged 2d platformer designed specifically for touch screens. No autorun and no virtual joysticks. Precise and highly responsive controls.Meet the Space Rabbits. Cute, fluffy bunnies from Space obsessed with speed and candies. Play with them through an adventure about betrayal, hard love and fun facts. With our new tap-based control system, you can move more freely, more precisely and faster than ever before - even faster than classic hardware controllers. It‚Äôs intuitive and easy to learn, hard to master... you know the drill. Play at your own pace or race against your friends or even the whole universe. It‚Äôs up to you.Don Padroncini, the infamous candy smuggler, has been sighted again. This time he is smuggling lumberjack equipment and defective gumball machines to the Copyrighted universe. The Intergalactic Authority on Everything sent Space Rabbits to stop him, but they fell into his trap. Or did they?FEATURES:‚Ä¢ No auto run ‚Ä¢ No virtual joysticks‚Ä¢ Precise and highly responsive controls done in a new and natural way. ‚Ä¢ Advanced movement techniques such as strafe jumping, wall sliding and ninja rope.‚Ä¢ Play against your friends, region or the whole universe.‚Ä¢ Watch replays of top 10 players on every level.‚Ä¢ 40+ unique, fun and hand crafted levels.‚Ä¢ Quirky outfits such as: Squatting Rabbits in Tracksuits, Disco Unicorn, Ninj0r and Little Red Rabbit Hood.
descriptionHTML:
Space Rabbits in Space is an award winning, fully-fledged 2d platformer designed specifically for touch screens. No autorun and no virtual joysticks. Precise and highly responsive controls.

Meet the Space Rabbits. Cute, fluffy bunnies from Space obsessed with speed and candies. Play with them through an adventure about betrayal, hard love and fun facts.

With our new tap-based control system, you can move more freely, more precisely and faster than ever before - even faster than classic hardware controllers. It’s intuitive and easy to learn, hard to master... you know the drill.

Play at your own pace or race against your friends or even the whole universe. It’s up to you.

Don Padroncini, the infamous candy smuggler, has been sighted again. This time he is smuggling lumberjack equipment and defective gumball machines to the Copyrighted universe. The Intergalactic Authority on Everything sent Space Rabbits to stop him, but they fell into his trap. Or did they?

FEATURES:
• No auto run
• No virtual joysticks
• Precise and highly responsive controls done in a new and natural way.
• Advanced movement techniques such as strafe jumping, wall sliding and ninja rope.
• Play against your friends, region or the whole universe.
• Watch replays of top 10 players on every level.
• 40+ unique, fun and hand crafted levels.
• Quirky outfits such as: Squatting Rabbits in Tracksuits, Disco Unicorn, Ninj0r and Little Red Rabbit Hood.
developerAddress:
340 S Lemon Ave 9714, Walnut, CA 91789
United States of America
summary: An award winning, fully-fledged 2d platformer designed for touch screens.
title: Space Rabbits in Space

Download the best RPG shooting game for free now!

Experience an epic story campaign, competitive and cooperative multiplayer, and an innovative social hub, all in one game!

In the futuristic world of Shadowgun Legends, humanity is under attack from a deadly alien invader. The last line of defence are the Shadowguns, legendary warriors and heroes. You are a young Shadowgun recruit with limitless potential who can turn the tide of war. So what are you waiting for? Join the fight and show the galaxy who’s boss!

THRILLING STORY CAMPAIGN
Save humanity from an alien invader in an epic Story Campaign spanning over 200+ mission on 4 diverse planets

CO-OP MISSIONS AND RAIDS
Join forces with friends and defeat giant enemy bosses for glory and legendary loot

RPG ELEMENTS AND CUSTOMIZATION
Choose from over 200 unique weapons including Handguns, Assault Rifles, Sub-Machine Guns, Heavy Machine Guns, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles and Rocket Launchers. From plasma beams to good old-fashioned lead bullets.

Dive into this free feature-packed FPS RPG and battle a terrifying alien menace, the Torment, who are rampaging across the Galaxy destroying everything in their path.

As a new Shadowgun recruit you will create your ultimate rockstar warrior with hundreds of weapons, dozens of combat skills, thousands of armor pieces, and a wild collection of cosmetic items and skins. As your fame grows you will indulge in the wild celebrity lifestyle of the most famous warriors in the Universe and carve your name into mankind’s history.

When you’re not mastering shooting skills you can unwind with your friends in the Shadowgun’s neighbourhood, where you’ll hang out with other players, hit the bar, chat, interact with NPCs and most importantly...party!

At MADFINGER Games we’ve always challenged ourselves to push the boundaries on mobile devices, and we’re proud of our console quality first person shooters. From our cutting edge graphics to our precise control system, over 180 million players worldwide have been blown away by our innovative approach and dedication to quality. descriptionHTML:
Classic Minesweeper game for your Android (also known as Mines). Exercise your strategic and logical thinking while having fun along the way! The goal is to uncover all cells that are not containing mines.

TIP: Use volume buttons to toggle mode Open cell/Put flag

Main features:
• Online highscores
• Large scrollable and zoomable game area
• Nice, clean and easy to use interface

Paid version is also available. See Minesweeper Professional. Advantages:
• No ads!
• Board Difficulty Control (3BV)
• Countdown timer
• Zoom tuning

German translation by CaBi Translation

Please feel free to contact me by email.
summary: Classic Minesweeper game for Android
title: Minesweeper Classic (Mines)

comments: Awesome game! Love the art, love the music, love the style, and the gameplay is actually challenging enough to hold my attention but not enough to be irritating. Perfect difficulty. Not to mention the colorblind mode actually works. I know this is receiving a lot of criticism, but I love the option you guys gave with ads and how well you executed it, that was a very nice touch. You really outdid yourselves with this one!

A very decent small game. I don't know what other people are complaining about but you can play the game without paying. The music is nice the graphics is nice it's easy to play. I hope there more levels in the future as this is such a fun game. Very nice one from the team at noodlecake Studios. Kudos my n*****

comments: The game is alright. Still too early to give it a proper review. Only here to say that the timers are way too long in the early stages of the game. Waiting an hour or four for thirty seconds of gameplay. They need to work on scaling the progression timers. A game like this is okay with long timers in late game when you have more than one thing to keep track of. But for these pay to win games to be profitable it helps to bait the hook a little harder before making you wait hours for more content.

This game is a solid mix of "clash of clans" and "fallout shelter". Just like COC, you have to learn to let the timers cool off. The long term time investment can be very rewarding. The questing/pvp is also well done considering you can't choose what to attack or when during battle. Wholeheartedly a good game.

GG easy. everyone whining being pay to play this that. i never bought anything and I'm loving this, just need a little patience and you can do many things untill one thing gets done or upgraded. I'm high in ranks, have a clan dedicated to non buyers. its all cool. been over 4 months and i still play this its amazing! great work guys, keep it up and keep adding new stuff.

I love the game.  The thing is, this game just gets boring.  For example,  all you can do right now is to vanquish invasions. That's basically it. The portal is not always open.  The tournament? Well the match ups are way too oblivious.  My in game friends already have started quitting coz of these problems. You have to add something fun soon. Well it is still a fun game tho.

Would be a great game if it wasn't blatantly pay to win.  Everything in the game is designed to push you to pay.  I enjoyed it at first and usually toss about $15 since it was decent.   But then, the system pairs you with opponents you can't defeat which then hampers your progress greatly which then means you either pay or hope you don't get attacked too much and lose all your resources.

Been playing since early access relese. Game is very well built. But like all other games. The ads now bugged. The daily quest for the ad has never worked for me. Starts ad restarts app no credit. Oh well its an ad right. Well now your forcing me to watch them. Please fix So can i atleast finish those 2 daily quest?!?!?!  Also since update my androids menu buttons overlay all buttons on far right/left hand of screen depending on tilt. Phone is an LG stylo 3. Please address and i will rerate later.
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they‚Äôll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies‚Äô castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who‚Äôll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy ‚Äì the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You‚Äôve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes‚Ä¶ and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don‚Äôt like‚Ä¶ And you don‚Äôt like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:
- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.
- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!
- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!
- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!
- Collections and unique heroes
- Daily log-in bonuses
- The improvement of the visual elements of the game
- The optimization and balance of the game process
- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
recentChanges: Fixed bugs and improved game performance
summary: Your castle, your rules!
title: Hustle Castle: Fantasy Kingdom

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

Not bad for free. Minimal ads. The two drawbacks are that in career mode, the game is slanted in the opponents favour too much. And in 1 on 1, it takes forever to load an opponent. Fix that and I would give it a five star rating. Also, it would be nice to see the developer actually respond to some people's concerns.

comments: This game is so dumb it's cute. The spells and attacks can be difficult, but only if you aren't watching your MP bar. Overall, I'd definitely recommend the game - though some tweaks to make the combat system a little easier to grasp for new players would definitely benefit the game.

I like this game, it's a nice tap game. However, there are some issues I have noticed, it will lag. The lagging kills me on a regular basis, but that's okay, it has infuriated me to an extent. The controls are self explanatory, so this is a nice game for parents to download for their kids to enjoy as well.

Since the game cost money I didn't think it would be one of those pay to win mobile games. I was wrong :( a basic crawler and idle game where you have to either wait for gold to mine or pay for gems to progress

I have absolutely no clue how to play this game. I just randomly tap some attacks, I don't understand when they work. I don't understand when to use them. Nice graphics, looks good, but I just do not understand.

The game is nice but have glitches that need to be fixed when you get to the 10th floor the boos glitches and stopped moving while I was healing up. Also if didn't move Intel I used an ability. Also when using an ability like healing you get so7nd effects every time that happens it glitch not sure why but when ever you get the same sound effect from taking money or healing you get a little glitch.
Paid pay to win. You can't buy almost anything with money from the game. Childish gameplay and history (not necessarily in a bad way, but I didn't liked it)

comments: I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!

The game itself is a lot of fun, it's challenging and addictive but with ads this game is a nightmare, they massively hinder your ability to progress and learn the game which is very frustrating. I made the in app purchase to remove the ads and without them the game is flawless. I think if the ads were reworked to be slightly less regular (i.e. not every time you lose) more people would be able to appreciate the game and might be more inclined to make the in aop purchase to remove them rather than getting annoyed at them before they've had a chance to enjoy the game.

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

descriptionHTML:
Krydsord.dk’s nyeste app på markedet fokuserer på lette kryds & tværs opgaver. ‘Den Lette’ er til dig, som ønsker at få et dagligt fix af krydsordsopgaver, som kan løses på ganske kort tid.

Som det er tilfældet med alle de andre apps fra Krydsord.dk, er ‘Den Lette’ 100% gratis at benytte. Betragt det som endnu en gave fra os til jer. Og som med de øvrige apps, finder du ligeledes altid mindst 30 opgaver i app’en. Og der lægges en ny opgave online hver dag.

Opgaverne er udover at være populære hos voksne, velegnede til børn og unge der ønsker at styrke deres sproglige færdigheder.

Afhængigt af dit niveau, så kan opgaverne normalt klares på helt ned til et par minutter - netop derfor har efterspørgslen på disse nemme krydsord været høj. De passer helt perfekt ind i en travl hverdag, hvor vi af og til har brug for et øjebliks fravær fra vores daglige gøremål.

Krydsord.dk ønsker dig rigtig god fornøjelse med ‘Den Lette’ - husk også at holde øje med vores øvrige apps: Krydsord.dk XL (designet til tablets) samt vores ‘Den Lille Daglige’ som er mest velegnet til smartphones - nøjagtig som det er tilfældet med ‘Den Lette’.

Hvis du oplever problemer eller har spørgsmål til nogle af kryds og tværs opgaverne hører vi meget gerne fra dig på gert@krydsord.dk.
summary: Light and free crossword to the busy life. Always free, new cross every day
title: Krydsord.dk Den lette

descriptionHTML:
~~> Fall in love with your high school crush, in this love story game! Flirt, date, & dress to impress in the most stylish outfits!
~~> Be the Prom Queen & dance with your date! Mix & match moves to create your own real-life dance routines - the combinations are endless!
~~> Earn popularity points & become the most popular girl in high school! You go girl!

Get ready for an amazing high school love story! There’s a cute new guy at school & rumor has it he has a crush on you! Flirt with him in the cafeteria & make him blush! What, did he just ask you to prom?! Are you in love? Glam up at the spa, add a touch of makeup and BAM - you look HOT! Dance the night away & have a ball - you only go to high school once, after all. Make your high school experience the love story of a lifetime!

Features:
> Dress up for the first day of school! Choose from tons of stylish clothing at the mall!
> Flirt with really cute boys in the cafeteria! Does your crush like you back?! Let’s make your love story dreams come true!
> Choreograph dances at Prom! Choose from tons of real-life dance moves!
> Collect hearts & earn popularity points! Become the most popular girl in school!
> Makeover time - choose from tons of makeup items, style your hair & more!
> Pamper yourself at the spa - get a cleaning facial so you feel fresh!
> Get your nails done at the Nail Salon - file, paint & design nail art!
> Strike a pose! Pose for your glam shot before Prom!
> Be the star of the school newspaper (and of your own love story)! Everyone is talking about YOU!

description: Integrate yourself into a world of high stakes deception and heart pumping action when you download, Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break. It's time to run, shoot and dodge fellow inmates and vicious prison guards. Feel the danger as you blast through three intense landscapes and enjoy amazing 3D graphics and pixel game animations. Download for FREE today and experience a classic block game for the ages.The Underbelly of the Justice System...Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man has been locked away behind bars at a super-max penitentiary, his termination imminent. He insists he's innocent, but there is no proof or ounce of human-compassion to support his claim. This man, is you. Meanwhile, his absence from the capitol has opened up the seat to a demonical politician whose corrupt beliefs have the capability of upturning a nation. Time is of the Essence... It's time to take drastic measures and claim your own freedom and prove your innocence before the government is overtaken by double crossing politicians and the nation as you know it is turned upside-down. Think Strategically, Fight for Survival...When the time is right, you make a break for it, knowing the inner workings of the system. Understanding this will be no easy task, but an exhausting feat of brute and intelligence, you begin the fight for your life. Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break is a challenging first person shooter action game that is a thrill a minute experience. From the collection of hidden melee and firearm weapons and the scattering of helpful pickups to the mobs of savage enemies and the tricky landscapes, this game is ripe with intense play. Enjoy intuitive controls and massive levels that boast dangerous battles that will require quick thinking and fast reflexes. Fight your way against dozens of foes and take control over the justice system as you battle your way to freedom. The fight starts now. Characteristics: Hidden melee & firearm weapons. Collect health and ammo pickups as you explore your surroundings. Prepare for enemies to increase as levels progress. Interactive map. Choose from a variety of weapons. Expansive levels to explore.
descriptionHTML:
Integrate yourself into a world of high stakes deception and heart pumping action when you download, Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break. It's time to run, shoot and dodge fellow inmates and vicious prison guards. Feel the danger as you blast through three intense landscapes and enjoy amazing 3D graphics and pixel game animations. Download for FREE today and experience a classic block game for the ages.

The Underbelly of the Justice System...
Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man has been locked away behind bars at a super-max penitentiary, his termination imminent. He insists he's innocent, but there is no proof or ounce of human-compassion to support his claim. This man, is you.

Meanwhile, his absence from the capitol has opened up the seat to a demonical politician whose corrupt beliefs have the capability of upturning a nation.

Time is of the Essence...
It's time to take drastic measures and claim your own freedom and prove your innocence before the government is overtaken by double crossing politicians and the nation as you know it is turned upside-down.

Think Strategically, Fight for Survival...
When the time is right, you make a break for it, knowing the inner workings of the system. Understanding this will be no easy task, but an exhausting feat of brute and intelligence, you begin the fight for your life.

Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break is a challenging first person shooter action game that is a thrill a minute experience. From the collection of hidden melee and firearm weapons and the scattering of helpful pickups to the mobs of savage enemies and the tricky landscapes, this game is ripe with intense play. Enjoy intuitive controls and massive levels that boast dangerous battles that will require quick thinking and fast reflexes. Fight your way against dozens of foes and take control over the justice system as you battle your way to freedom. The fight starts now.


Characteristics: Hidden melee & firearm weapons. Collect health and ammo pickups as you explore your surroundings. Prepare for enemies to increase as levels progress. Interactive map. Choose from a variety of weapons. Expansive levels to explore.

comments: This is the best life simulator game by far. Instead of just focusing on getting rich this game has many other focuses like love, nationality, jobs, kids etc. The one thing that isn't at all necessary but I kind of want to see is a avatar for the character you're playing as. Perfect game. üòÅüëç  EDIT: hi just reporting on a glitch in the game. There's an option to transition your gender bit even though my character is over 18 they can't do it. Otherwise still a perfect game.

I think it's incredible and I am hooked. Although I do hope for more such as, instead of just instagram famous, perhaps become a famed scientist, actor, writer, astronaut or business person OR be known as beloved (or not so) Educator/Teacher etc. A bit more drama added with partner/children good and not so good. Varying reactions to their dilemmas, perhaps even a child dating, married, having a child (grandkids) and other random child updates with or without the option to react accordingly. Overall, addictive and thoughtful game.

Hi - playing this game for a few months now and a big fan. I suggested during beta phase that there should be an option of money management as well. We can be a millionaire but dont know what to do with all that liquid. We should be able to invest in moveable and immoveble assets. Should be able to open a company/business and invest in other company's stocks etc. This game will be even more interesting that way. Hope we will see these features soon. Thanks.

I have been playing through the beta phase, and am completely hooked. You can pick it up and play whenever the mood strikes. It is easy to grasp, every new life is different, and it is engrossing without being addictive. Once you're done with a life you can create a new one or close the app and move on with your real one. There is no waiting for something to build or happen, there are very few ads and most are by choice to gain something. There are no in-app purchases to enhance game play, its all there from the beginning. The developers have done an incredible job with a simple concept.

Truly amazing game. Highly recommended to anyone who likes simulator games. Works without wifi and the developers listen to what u have to say. Sure, there are a few glitches but I'm sure they'll get fixed over time. Loved it Edit: can you transition your gender without having gender dysphoria

First of all, congratulations on the full release! I've been playing this game for a few months now and I'm absolutely hooked. Whenever I'm bored or don't want to use my phone's data, I just play this game. There are a few things that I think would be cool to add in or go more in depth with, but other than that, this game is borderline perfect! I reccomend downloading
description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
developerAddress:
71-75 Shelton Street,
Covent Garden,
London,
WC2H 9JQ
summary: Like your life - but instant.
title: InstLife

comments: The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

really good game i love it but just some ideas that might make it even better (I think the menu on the left side could have a higher contrast (text and background)or I think the trophy chest amount could be adjusted to the player amount in the clan +to participate in trophy chest you have to be in the clan since it started (midnight)please do some balance changes soon... some untis don't feel to be used enough or some just are OP like the steel saw mech or another idea :to have some way to delete (locked) chests )please reply if you (4:33)see it and want to give a statement

Its a good game, i like this kind of games and i love when i play with friends too! The game its really easy to play, a strategy game and simply as destroy the enemy base... Love it! Its true that not all are going to like this but for me this game its 5 stars. Btw i have started the game and i said i love to play with friends, does this game has a Couple/Duo match to play with them (Not versus them). Thanks in advice, keep staying great!!

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. I only have 5 slots to open chests and it cost gems to open the chest and money to get gems. Other than that, the gameplay is solid. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...

Whether it is swarming the opponent with infantry troops, blasting your way through enemy defenses with tanks or surprising the enemy with exploding rats! descriptionHTML:
Enemies up ahead Commander!
Plan out your strategy and the use of Battle Point to outstrip your opponents with your troops in the extended battlefields!

Go all out BOOM with the newest RTS type mobile game! Be the commander to your always ready for action troops and epic units and lead them to glory!
Take control of the battle and be ready to bring on the BOOM with over 70 different types of units. Whether it is swarming the opponent with infantry troops, blasting your way through enemy defenses with tanks or surprising the enemy with exploding rats!
Do whatever it takes to be the one with the best strategy and to emerge victorious!
Battle it out and become the most feared commander and expert strategist.

FEATURES
- Global real-time strategy battle!
- Enjoy the vast and panoramic battlefield and adapt your strategy.
- Bring on the BOOM with over 70+ units and weapons at your disposal!
- Join forces with your Legion members and battle your way to the top of the world!
- Enjoy the face melting graphics!
- Limitless strategy to blow up your enemies with the use of tanks or unit-producing buildings.
*Disclaimer: BOOM is not an addiction, it’s a necessity!

descriptionHTML:
- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration - one of the best pixelated games in the first-person mode, time-tested! This game will not leave you indifferent and will present many interesting subjects and opportunities.

This game is created in the style of a sandbox with an open world, in which the player does not have any specific goals. You choose what to do in this game.

Explore the endless world of blocks and cubes. The most interesting war against zombies at night. Crafting and gathering, survival and building. And much much much more ...

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration provides the player with a three-dimensional generated world, entirely consisting of cubic blocks. This world you can freely rebuild, creating from the blocks of complex structures.

Features:

*** Easy operation and unrivaled interface
*** A lot of game modes of the game.
*** Numerous types of weapons for your taste.
*** Zombies and fighting with them.
*** The most diverse construction. Even more possibilities for creativity without limits.
*** Beautiful pixel graphics Super HD. Very beautiful texture in high resolution.
*** High FPS, without compromise.
*** For children and adults.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game has three modes.

Survival mode.
In this mode, you must extract natural resources (wood and stone, various minerals). Of these, you can build a variety of tools, blocks and elements. In the dark hours of the day there are dangerous monsters and zombies.

Creativity.
In this mode, you have unlimited access to all things, things, and building blocks. You can instantly destroy any blocks.

Multiplayer mode.
The name of this regime speaks for itself. Play with your friends and win.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game is developed by a professional team of developers with the involvement of design, rezhsure and sound specialists.

The pixel world is waiting for you!
summary: - # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -
title: Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration

descriptionHTML:
Er du træt af de gammeldags brugergrænseflader i ordlege?
Har du lyst til at opleve en ordleg på en helt ny måde?
★★★ Nu kan du downloade Ord Kryds og spille GRATIS på BRÆT! ★★★
 
Ord Kryds er en kreativ ordleg som udfordrer din hjerne. Spillet har alt hvad en ordleg skal have og er fuldstændigt VANEDANNENDE & UNDERHOLDENDE.
 
➤ Nyt & Friskt Look: Hvis du kan lide at spille brætspil og puslespil, vil du elske den rene og friske BRÆT-GRÆNSEFLADE ved første øjekast.
 
➤ Praktisk & Nemt at Spille: Du kan let swipe bogstaverne for at danne et specifikt skjult ord. Det er nemt at spille og sjovt at mestre for alle. 

➤ Overraskende Bonus: Log ind hver dag og få daglig bonus. Optjen mønter når du har fundet de Ekstra Ord, som ikke findes på brættet.

➤ Over 3.000 Spændende Udfordringer: Det er nemt i begyndelsen og bliver hurtigt udfordrende. Test hvor mange ord du kender. Flere baner er på vej.

➤ 100% Vanedannende Ordleg: Du vil aldrig opleve et kedeligt øjeblik! Spil dette krydsordsspil én gang og du vil ikke kunne lægge det fra dig!
 

☆ HVORDAN MAN SPILLER ☆

- Swipe bogstaverne, sæt dem i række og fyld de blanke felter lodret og vandret på brættet
- Tryk på knappen “Bland” for at ændre rækkefølgen af bogstaver
- Tryk på knappen “Tips” for at få hjælp


★ FUNKTIONER ★

• Flot & Rent BRÆT til dig (Følg med for personliggjorte designs)
• Find ekstra ord for at indsamle mønter
• 3000+ BANER som du kan spille
• GRATIS at få Daglig Bonus mønter
• Passende for både børn og voksne til at træne ordsøgningsevner
• Ingen netværksforbindelse påkrævet og du kan nyde ordsøgning når som helst
• Enkelt og nemt at spille, udfordrende gameplay
• Helt GRATIS for alle spillere
