comments: This game is so helpful and educational too. It helps to boost IQ and gives a lots of trivias and facts about the whole world. I'd like the way that the game has its different categories to offer.  The only concern for me is the time to fill up the brain power. I think the time is somehow long enough and we have to wait for a long time. I suggest to the developer if you can make it a little bit shorter like 5 to 10 mins.   But overall this game is good! Thanks

Everything was going fine until I started losing brainpower, even after winning the duel. This is quite frustrating and one of the reasons for a 3 star rating. Hope the developer looks into the matter. Another suggestion: There should be an option for reviewing the answers after every duel which would make the game much more informative! Edit: It would be great if the developers could add 'Business' as one of the categories of the gameplay.

The platform is good. The problem is just too many questions and answers are incorrect. Need a lot of fact checking before really launching new questions. Have to presume those user submitted q&a wrong until proven otherwise. Scrupulous people who know their stuff won't submit. Careless people who don't really know will.

Actually a good idea for a good game. Some questions are totally WRONG. And I don't know where to report those. Like there's a "Miami Airport" in Helsinki? No there's Malmi Airport. And how come is Lappland in Denmark and not in Finland? And so on...

Not happy about the power ups... it's annoying watching ads after brain power runs out. Even when I consistently win it makes no difference. Not going to waste my time with this one, which is a shame. I actually like it.

I frequently run out of brain power... Then I become frustrated.. Well that's because I am addicted to it.. Been continuously playing.. Please do something so that I can play all day without running out of brain power
description: Knowledge is the key element in Trivia Town. You compete to see who knows the most and can come up with the biggest amount of right answers. Trivia Town is all about quizzing, and you battle friends and new faces. With 20,000 questions, the game is a constant challenge. If you are a genius, it will soon become apparent to all, when you take part in this fair and fun online pop quiz feud. Even though fairness ranks high within Trivia Town, you still have the opportunity to influence your fight against your opponents. When you play the game, you can bet on your answers. For every question, you can choose whether to bet 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5 points when you submit your answer. In this way, you can crack your opponent in one of two ways: By being the biggest knowledge genius, or by playing the game strategically. In other words: Trivia Town is a challenge for all types of players. A battle within Trivia Town takes just under two minutes, so finding time for a quick pop quiz and a fun game between friends is nearly always possible. The 20,000 questions are divided into ten topics:  Music, Movies & TV, Geography, Society & Politics, Science & Tech, Nature, Sports & Games, Food & Drink, History and Art & Literature.To help you look for the right answer every question has been equipped with a picture. At the same time, you get to play in peace, free from disturbing ads and unfair power ups. We have worked hard to make sure that Trivia Town is a ‚Äúclean‚Äù brain exercise with no interruptions. The game is and will remain all about knowledge and brainwork. Trivia Town is a new game every time you log in. We have gone to great lengths to ensure that you and your opponent get fresh, new questions every time you play. You can play real time, or whenever you have time to accept your friend‚Äôs challenge. There is no max to how long you can keep the quiz feud going. At present, the game contains over 20,000 questions, and new ones are being added all the time. You can even add questions yourself and see how well they do among the other players. This way, if you have special knowledge in certain areas, everyone benefits from it. Trivia Town was born to grow indefinitely in terms of both questions and knowledge. So, if you are a trivia nerd and you love to quiz and use your brain, get started right away. Download Trivia Town and get to know the most amazing things. For instance, did you know that Tacos de Sesos means ‚Äúbrain tacos‚Äù‚Ä¶?
descriptionHTML:
Knowledge is the key element in Trivia Town. You compete to see who knows the most and can come up with the biggest amount of right answers. Trivia Town is all about quizzing, and you battle friends and new faces. With 20,000 questions, the game is a constant challenge. If you are a genius, it will soon become apparent to all, when you take part in this fair and fun online pop quiz feud. Even though fairness ranks high within Trivia Town, you still have the opportunity to influence your fight against your opponents. When you play the game, you can bet on your answers. For every question, you can choose whether to bet 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5 points when you submit your answer. In this way, you can crack your opponent in one of two ways: By being the biggest knowledge genius, or by playing the game strategically. In other words: Trivia Town is a challenge for all types of players.

A battle within Trivia Town takes just under two minutes, so finding time for a quick pop quiz and a fun game between friends is nearly always possible. The 20,000 questions are divided into ten topics: Music, Movies & TV, Geography, Society & Politics, Science & Tech, Nature, Sports & Games, Food & Drink, History and Art & Literature.

To help you look for the right answer every question has been equipped with a picture. At the same time, you get to play in peace, free from disturbing ads and unfair power ups. We have worked hard to make sure that Trivia Town is a “clean” brain exercise with no interruptions. The game is and will remain all about knowledge and brainwork.

Trivia Town is a new game every time you log in. We have gone to great lengths to ensure that you and your opponent get fresh, new questions every time you play. You can play real time, or whenever you have time to accept your friend’s challenge. There is no max to how long you can keep the quiz feud going.

At present, the game contains over 20,000 questions, and new ones are being added all the time. You can even add questions yourself and see how well they do among the other players. This way, if you have special knowledge in certain areas, everyone benefits from it. Trivia Town was born to grow indefinitely in terms of both questions and knowledge.

So, if you are a trivia nerd and you love to quiz and use your brain, get started right away. Download Trivia Town and get to know the most amazing things. For instance, did you know that Tacos de Sesos means “brain tacos”…?

descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.

A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARS

We have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!

BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTS

You will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC

Staying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!

FREE TO PLAY

The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.

GAME FEATURES

▶ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles
▶ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!
▶ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.
▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions
▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view

comments: Maybe add an option to disable some graphics. Like the fimish animation. It does not add much to the game experience but it affects the performance quite a bit.  About the ads: I have premium, and I only have to watch an ad if I choose to get a reward in return. There are no sudde, unwanted or random ads anymore.

Simple game. Ads galore. Also when ads pop up better not be listening to music because it's gonna pause your music even if the ad has 0 sound. Thus the one star rating. You can advertise all you want but don't interrupt any background apps to force me to look at your ad. That's just messed up.

First of all the game it self is a great little game. Graphics are fine game play is simple and easy to pick up it's a good game. Now for the reason it only gets two stars. WAY TO MANY ADS! I mean for f@$k sake every two seconds there's an ad. Click on the car buying button there's an ad. Sit there to long there's an ad. I understand this is how you make your money but come on there's a line and you didn't just cross it you swan dived over that bad boy. I'm sorry but I do not recommended this game for anyone.

This game totally sucks like most of the other reviewers said. Nothing but forced ads with NO reward or compensation for our time and intelligence. And it lacks any originality. It's just another stupid boring merger game like the thousands before it. On a fun scale of 1 to 10, this game is a 0 for all the ads and unoriginality. It was a free game, but I want my money and time and intelligence back.

Potential to be a great game but wayyyy to many ads, like every 10 seconds of gameplay there's a 30 second ad, and when you choose to watch an ad to get a reward you never actually get it. Waste of time. No idol earnings so you have to have the app open to advance and forces you to watch more ads.i get you want to make money but this app is basically unplayable.
A 60 second add for every 30 seconds of play is ridiculous. All I can say is don't waste your time unless you like to learn how to kill a game with to many advertisments

comments: Love the game, easy to understand and they have videos on how to use the equipment and make ur farm expand. Also, their customer service is great!!  Recently my phone was stole and had to get a new phone.  Familyfarm helped me recover my farm within a couple of days.  Their services were quick and resourceful.

Fun game, but...What happened?  Don't like the snow,  it lightened all the colors of everything, they are not as vivid as they usually are.. With cataracts,  too hard on eyes,  all print got really small and can't read anymore.  Will have to quit til eyes get fixed.

I love the game and have played it for almost 5 years now but for some reason it will not connect to facebook. Not sure what happened in the last update. Hopefully it gets fixed soon. I would hate if my phone got messed up and my progress is not saved

The game used to be good but it has been hanging up repeatedly with the recent updates. Open a treasure chest/daily chest to get a reward will forever be loading and not running. Have to shut down the whole game and redo the quests again. Auto-save for the game had also been unstable, with us having to redo the stuff that we have done previously. It's very frustrating given that we have planted some crops and only to realise that the crops we had planted were not actually planted when we revisit the farm to harvest those crops.

This game was good and fine then it crashed and when I reopened it it had lost all my progress from level 36 to 21. What a waste of time so annoyed. How the hell do i get my game back? It looks like it connected to a Facebook account and loaded an old game but I don't gave the option to disconnect. So frustrated!

This was my favorite game but lately it has so many problems. Things I've completed keep DISSAPPERING and I have to keep redoing them to move on in the game. I've been asking for help for a few months now. Also there are tons and tons of issues with the game crashing. I've done everything to fix this that I was told to do yet nothing is working. As for contacting the link sent to the reply to this I've also done that a few times now with no help. I've been using the in game help tab and keep getting told its been sent to another help team. I've spent Way too much real money on this game and if not fixed soon will want it all back and the deleting the game.   Please fix this so once again I can give it 5 stars. Since the last update the game is now closing in it's own. This is very frustrating. So again as I've asked above please fix this .

descriptionHTML:
Beautiful and fun farming simulation game. Raise cute farm animals and harvest diverse crops to make your farm a success! It's up to you to make your dream farm by the seaside. Start building your dream farm now.

■■ Game Features ■■
✓ Played by over 60 million people all around the world!
✓ Tired of upgrading the Barn? Enjoy unlimited Barn space.
✓ Prepare more than 400+ dishes in the kitchen.
✓ Plant, harvest and produce over 200+ unique products!
✓ Compete with other farmers in the new Farm Beauty Contest!
✓ Daily orders and new missions added regularly for more fun!
✓ 500+ unique, cute, and well-designed decorations!
✓ Adopt pets and costume them with pet apparel and equipment. Now you can breed pets to make new baby pets!
✓ Exotic Island Farm: Explore a Mine, Garden!
✓ Marine Sea Resort: You are now the owner of the Sea Resort! Complete resort orders and build the best resort for visitors to come to!
✓ Visit neighbors' farms and sample their newest dishes to earn prizes, help clean decorations, and trade for needed farm products!

Family Farm Seaside supports 21 languages including; English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian Bokmål, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

※ Product Usage Details
- Recommended Specifications: CPU Quad core 2.3GHz, Ram 2GB
- Minimum Specifications: CPU Quad core 1.5GHz, Ram 1GB

※ Access permission notice for gameplay
STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ App Notes
- This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.
- Family Farm Seaside is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game can be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

※ Contact Us!
- Family Farm Seaside Custmer Support: https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/family-farm-seaside/
- Need more neighbors and want to get game news and tips? »»» Like 👍 our official Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/familyfarmseaside
- Privacy Policy: http://www.funplusgame.com/privacy_policy/
developerAddress: PO Box309, Ugland House, Grand Cayman, KY1-1104 Cayman Islands

description: |happy wheels| is a fun and free game is fairly easy to understand and play.|happy wheels| is an obstacle rag-doll extreme sports game, your goals is to reach the finish line, you will encounter various obstacles that can damage your character.When you get bored with your office work , sitting at the table is just full of paper . Why not have a rolling down the hill under blue sky with csr bike race game on the bicycle wheel?.Drive your bike into a very happy adventure racing under hot sky.This game is a rag-doll extreme csr sports game. Experience the real physics based racing game on your phone, |happy wheels| offers an exhilarating mix of amazing tracks, a little of fortune and deadly challenges. Feel the dash speed as you negotiate your way through the deadly survival courses. Perform death defying wild stunts, witness bone cracking impacts and lose a limb or few, and take it to the extreme!Experience the feeling of rolling down the hill under blue sky with bike race is wonderful, drive rolling ahead the hill, dash crossing the mountain, paper flower is falling in the road. Or just like a dumb guy drive the csr bike to the dumb racing and find the ways not to die. Rolling down a hill under the hot sky,your wheel is hot , your legs so tired, just one way is drive ahead and a little fortune, but there are many hill to rolling, mountain to climb, river to cross and.. many ways to die. Welcome to |happy wheels| A very happy csr bike race game. You will be a racing biker drive your wheel in the hot racing , your task is tap screen to dash and rolling down the hill, crossing the river, under shining sky and then go finished . Sometime you run like a dumb guy, just find the ways to die. Keep in your mind alway drive ahead, no return, it just dash ahead and ahead , waiting for a little fortune.. descriptionHTML:
|happy wheels| is a fun and free game is fairly easy to understand and play.
|happy wheels| is an obstacle rag-doll extreme sports game, your goals is to reach the finish line, you will encounter various obstacles that can damage your character.


When you get bored with your office work , sitting at the table is just full of paper . Why not have a rolling down the hill under blue sky with csr bike race game on the bicycle wheel?.Drive your bike into a very happy adventure racing under hot sky.
This game is a rag-doll extreme csr sports game. Experience the real physics based racing game on your phone, |happy wheels| offers an exhilarating mix of amazing tracks, a little of fortune and deadly challenges. Feel the dash speed as you negotiate your way through the deadly survival courses. Perform death defying wild stunts, witness bone cracking impacts and lose a limb or few, and take it to the extreme!
Experience the feeling of rolling down the hill under blue sky with bike race is wonderful, drive rolling ahead the hill, dash crossing the mountain, paper flower is falling in the road. Or just like a dumb guy drive the csr bike to the dumb racing and find the ways not to die. Rolling down a hill under the hot sky,your wheel is hot , your legs so tired, just one way is drive ahead and a little fortune, but there are many hill to rolling, mountain to climb, river to cross and.. many ways to die.
Welcome to |happy wheels| A very happy csr bike race game. You will be a racing biker drive your wheel in the hot racing , your task is tap screen to dash and rolling down the hill, crossing the river, under shining sky and then go finished . Sometime you run like a dumb guy, just find the ways to die. Keep in your mind alway drive ahead, no return, it just dash ahead and ahead , waiting for a little fortune.. If just a small dumb mistake or you’re not a fortune man, many ways to die, your csr bike will be destroyed as a torn piece of paper by the death race.
Tap the forward button to dash, tap turn left or turn right button to rotate your wheel in the air . When encountering obstacles tap stop button to decrease the speed. All you need is timing to tap the buttons and a little fortune.

|happy wheels| is a rag-doll physics Arcade & extreme sports Racing game in which you can jump off buildings, crush the glass & avoid obstacles & spikes and arrow

|happy wheels| a game in which all you need to survive.

comments: I AM OBSESSED!!! This game is awesome, I love shooting things that deserve to be shot!!! The only problem is that you need to be a certain level to buy something and how there's only boots and helmets, and no chest plates or leggings, but when I first played it I was shocked to find 2 problems in an amazing app! 5 stars everything! Also, you should make huge, amazing looking, almost impossible bosses that will make me flip my table when I can't beat them! Keep making more awesome games!

I understand that people want their games to be entartaining. But i dont understand why there is a thing that downgrades your item upon trying to upgrade it. I have soent the last 3 hours trying to upgrade my helm to lvl 15. Guess where it is now, On goddamn lvl 11. I have spent less time grinding mounts in wow than getting my gear to lvl 15. Stupidest thing ever. One tip. Play the campagin lvls to lvl 40. Then dont do campagin at all and run hell for gold and xp. Repeqt to lvl 80 and then get rekt by the stupid item upgrade system.

This game would be perfect if the controls were better. They are nonsense. Doesn't always shoot when I tap, jumping is crazy, and the game gives you multiple ways to control, but they are all garbage. Also would have appreciated a tutorial so I knew what I was doing

I really like the game. But there's one thing that annoys me: when I don't play this game for a few hours and then I do another battle in dungeon, the game crashes after killing last monster in that battle.  I found out that if I switch on mobile data it works. So I wanted to asked why is that. EDIT: now all works just fine. 5 stars

The best game on market right now. No ads, unless you request it for coins,(which I doubt you'll need to), many modes, including HELL(Infinite waves), MAP(To gain access to abilities and magic) and BATTLE(Normal wave advancement with bosses every 5 levels.). By far the best game that advertises it is not pay to play. Because it's not, despite the option to buy coins.

I'm really loving this game it's simple but still a ton of fun. My one complaint would be the sometimes the grind is too long and I almost gave up... I wish the developers would throw in some kind of experience boost in the store instead of just being able to buy coins. I would pay real money for an exp boost and would love to support the Developers! just give me the chance!

comments: I would've rated it 5 stars if it was somehow faster. I just want to fastforward all the animation that is happening there. I mean I saw it the first time. Great. I got it: "cat jumps into a boat and then goes underwater, after that it goes out". All this animation takes more time than the actual playing. Same thing with letters: I get letters every time. And I've stoped reading them cause there is a lot of text and I have no idea what for. Inspite of that - it's a good game. Nice and simple

I think this is a really cute game so far. Nice time waster. Couple of problems with reading letters, sometimes it will say "new" and nothing is there, or I try to read the letter and it ends and I can't scroll. Another plus would be to add how many fish are needed to get gold in the fish trophy category. Overall, still a really cute game. Worth the install no doubt!

Ads aren't a problem in this game. As for the game itself, my girlfriend and I love it. It's a good time waster and it can get pretty addicting. Some reviews expressed annoyance at the price of upgrades, but we have almost fully upgraded our gun and tank and it's been fine. We get about 40,000 each catch so far, so exchanging for parts is no big deal. Maybe people just haven't figured out how to be more efficient.

This game is just perfect. It has a complete free to play style and doesn't force ads upon you, instead, they are completely optional to get extra currency or more time. You could go through the entire game without watching a single dad if you wanted to and I love these types of games. The graphics are adorable and the controls are easy. I highly recommend this game.

Fun and relaxed game that I can easily see myself spending hours sniping fish. There is a bit of strategy to the game with the changing weather, predators, and upgrade system. Blindly shooting your harpoon will just lead to short, frustrating sessions so its best to learn the mechanics quickly or you'll end up with pretty sad catches. Thankfully, its a straightforward game so most should have no problem with it. With all the features, its well worth an install/play. Bonus? The ads are entirely optional and provide YOU bonuses.

I like it alot but the issue with it is that prices go up to fast and you dont get enough when you upgrade things, its almost pointless. Other than this MAJOR issue its great! In sereosness i do enjoy playing this game alot and i recomend it to you all!

description: Have you ever thought of being menacing prehistoric sea monster & rule the ocean? Sea Dragon Simulator is here to give you that experience. Play as treacherous predator of the ocean. You are a giant big beast with insatiable appetite who can hunt & eat everything that comes in his way. Attack boats, ships, and ski jets to feed your monster. This brute can feel & smell the prey near it. Use your charge attack to break the underwater mirror tunnels, grab people & rip them apart. Use your sharp jaws to create havoc before they breakout.Watch out! You have to use your combo power to save yourself from other sea monsters, they will attack you, injure you & kill you. This is real underwater rampage adventure & sea environment experience! Complete your hunt & fulfill your hunger as fast as you can before you get hunted. Show no mercy, Chase your prey, attack and grab it in the sharp jaws to kill instantly. So, Its time to feed your monster!Sea Dragon Simulator Features:‚Ä¢	Realistic underwater sea experience‚Ä¢	3D graphics, ocean & beach environment‚Ä¢	Thrilling hunting experience with sea dragon monster‚Ä¢	Variety of missions with graduating difficulty.‚Ä¢	Smooth & intuitive controls ‚Ä¢	Easy & fun to play
descriptionHTML:
Have you ever thought of being menacing prehistoric sea monster & rule the ocean?

Sea Dragon Simulator is here to give you that experience. Play as treacherous predator of the ocean. You are a giant big beast with insatiable appetite who can hunt & eat everything that comes in his way. Attack boats, ships, and ski jets to feed your monster. This brute can feel & smell the prey near it. Use your charge attack to break the underwater mirror tunnels, grab people & rip them apart. Use your sharp jaws to create havoc before they breakout.

Watch out! You have to use your combo power to save yourself from other sea monsters, they will attack you, injure you & kill you. This is real underwater rampage adventure & sea environment experience! Complete your hunt & fulfill your hunger as fast as you can before you get hunted. Show no mercy, Chase your prey, attack and grab it in the sharp jaws to kill instantly.

So, Its time to feed your monster!

Sea Dragon Simulator Features:
• Realistic underwater sea experience
• 3D graphics, ocean & beach environment
• Thrilling hunting experience with sea dragon monster
• Variety of missions with graduating difficulty.
• Smooth & intuitive controls
• Easy & fun to play
summary: Get ready to feel the rage of Sea Dragon!

description: In Coolshop Point Packer you will help Jacob pack Coolshop products and send them to the excited customers. It needs to go fast in the packing hall, where you have to toss the products in the boxes on the conveyor belt, by swiping.The more boxes you hit, the higher score you will get. If you hit several times in a row, your score doubles - and remember to aim well so you don‚Äôt run out of products to toss!You can enjoy several hours of entertainment with many varying levels, where the aim is to pack the boxes before they disappear along the conveyor belt. Some levels must be completed on time and in others you must achieve a certain score.Play on your smartphone or tablet. While playing you can earn Coolshop Points that you can redeem when shopping at Coolshop.com.It's free to play Coolshop Point Packer, but you have the opportunity to buy boosters, extra moves, and lives directly in the game.Features:‚úîÔ∏è Throw footballs, game controllers, perfume bottles, etc.‚úîÔ∏è Many different, fun and challenging game modes‚úîÔ∏è Challenge yourself and refine your packing technique in 50 levels (more levels to come!)‚úîÔ∏è Earn Coolshop Points, which can be used on Coolshop.comLike Coolshop on Facebook and get news and great deals: facebook.com/CoolShop.dkCredits:Concept and platform by Gamerce ApSGame design and production by Copenhagen Creators ApS
descriptionHTML:
In Coolshop Point Packer you will help Jacob pack Coolshop products and send them to the excited customers. It needs to go fast in the packing hall, where you have to toss the products in the boxes on the conveyor belt, by swiping.

The more boxes you hit, the higher score you will get. If you hit several times in a row, your score doubles - and remember to aim well so you don’t run out of products to toss!

You can enjoy several hours of entertainment with many varying levels, where the aim is to pack the boxes before they disappear along the conveyor belt. Some levels must be completed on time and in others you must achieve a certain score.

Play on your smartphone or tablet. While playing you can earn Coolshop Points that you can redeem when shopping at Coolshop.com.

It's free to play Coolshop Point Packer, but you have the opportunity to buy boosters, extra moves, and lives directly in the game.

Features:
✔️ Throw footballs, game controllers, perfume bottles, etc.
✔️ Many different, fun and challenging game modes
✔️ Challenge yourself and refine your packing technique in 50 levels (more levels to come!)
✔️ Earn Coolshop Points, which can be used on Coolshop.com

Like Coolshop on Facebook and get news and great deals: facebook.com/CoolShop.dk

Credits:
Concept and platform by Gamerce ApS
Game design and production by Copenhagen Creators ApS
summary: Help Coolshop pack items and earn points that can be used on Coolshop.com.
title: Coolshop Point Packer

descriptionHTML:
Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!

Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:

>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals

>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy

>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses

>LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuff

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
summary: Welcome to a farm where you can play with your own herd in a Horse Stable!
title: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator

description: The Amazing Spider-Hero was a regular teenage boy before an alien arachnobeast fused with him and gave him amazing special powers! He became stronger, faster, more agile and has animal-like instincts that can help him detect and avoid dangers. Instructed by his father who is an expert in 42 forms of martial arts, including taekwondo, kickboxing, kung fu, boxing, wresting, muay thai, jiu jitsu, and many more, he made full use of his new-found powers to become a hero of justice and righteousness, donning the mantle of Spider-Hero. But that's not all, the strange Spider-Hero's great intellect also allowed him to develop many useful equipment to combat crime and battle villains. Aided by his mother, the head of a highly advanced research center, the Avenger Institute, he created various versions of his Spider-Suit each more powerful than the last and further enhances his strength, power, spider-sense, and agility. The Spider-Suits also come equipped with highly advanced Web-Spinners which allow the Amazing Spider-Hero to capture or immobilize foes with ease and play with them like a fidget spinner.Even with all that, the Amazing Spider-Hero is still just a teenage boy, he can't be out all the time. So, he must go through a long journey home while defending justice and beating up whatever thugs and monsters that may be in his way before going back to the Avenger Institute.The Amazing Spider-Hero is heading home, but many strange thugs, mutant brutes and strange mutant bulk monsters will try to stop him on the way home. Play as the Amazing Spider-Hero in multi heroic action as he jumps across rooftops, enemies, and helicopters get as far and defeat as many criminals as he can before getting home. Use marvellous spider powers like double-jumps, web-shots, and hyper-dives to fight thugs and jump across buildings! Leap across buildings, jump above enemies and become the best Spider-Hero of 2018 and beyond! Will you be the truly marvellous Amazing Spider-Hero Homecoming?Features:- Amazing 2D Graphics & Animation- Amazing Running Gameplay- Amazing Spider-Suits- Amazing Spider-Powers- Amazing Spider-Hero- Amazing FREE Game of 2018Become the most amazing superhero, defender of justice, warrior of good, and guardian of humanity in 2018 and beyond as Spider-Hero, in Spider-Hero: Homecoming. Play now and prove your heroic worth!As always, check out our other AMAZING games at Gunaga! Thank you for playing.

I know most the bingos are fake people getting them because there is no way to bingo after three numbers have been called, but yet 5 people will get bingo after three numbers every round. Such a shame because this could be the best bingo game ever, but i guess this bingo game is all about ripping people off. Wish it would go back the way it was and be fun again. Rainbow bingo adventure has become my new bingo game, it is alot like bingo pop but actually lets you win!!!

BEST FREE GAME EVER!! I have been playing for almost a year now and I love this game. You don't need to put in money unless you want to play for a long time. Each ad you watch gives you cherries to play the game, so its like getting paid to watch them. I am playing now and I just had to stop and share how fun this game is. If you like BINGO, this is the game for you!

It could be one of the best bingo games out there, but its hard to keep up cherries when it barley will give you triple or mega. Also have lost cherries. Ive had at least 100 cherries. Come back a few hours later and they are all gone! And cutting in half the daily cherries I've already worked to get is ridiculous! Going to be uninstalling

I would give you 5 stars except for the last 3 to 4 days it keeps telling me I have new content over & over. It acts like it's updating only to tell me the same thing over & over. I have missed out on getting my daily credits because of this.

This game is so addictive can't stop playing it... Everyone should play Pop Bingo it's so Fun... I love it... The only thing I have to complain about is the cherries don't last you long enough... It's kinda hard to build the cherries up.. I wish Thier was More ways to get Free Cherries.. But other then that I can't stop playing this game ... Thanks so much for making a fun Bingo Game...

When I first started playing over 6 months ago everything was great. It is the best bingo game on Google Play and I have tried every one of them. but the last 78 bingo games I have played, I have not got one Bingo and I barely get any of the numbers it calls. The last 10 numbers it called on one of them, I didn't even get one of the numbers. Is bingo pop broken? I'm tired of spending hundreds of dollars each week on cherries üòí

descriptionHTML:
Classic game Dominoes Puzzle Science style is completely free now, but also a very famous puzzle game.
As a classic puzzle game, Dominoes Puzzle Science style is famous for a long time.
Whether the elderly, women, children or housewives or fashionable women, are very suitable for play, will love this game.
Dominoes Puzzle Science style is also a fun and enjoyable game, suitable for playing with family.

What do we hope for?
We hope to bring you relaxation and enjoyment.
We hope to help you solve boring time.
We hope to practice your mind and fingers.
We hope you will not be alone, we will always be with you.

Unlike the test-word games, Dominoes Puzzle Science style is great for people of all different languages.

How to play Dominoes Puzzle Science style?
1. Place equal or greater than three squares of the same number in a horizontal or vertical position to blend them.
2. You can also rotate them before placing them.
3. Blending as many squares as possible to get high scores.

If you have an elderly person in your family and you want them to stay away from games in mahjong, playing cards or other casinos, and do something to consume boring time.
If your wife, children, or girlfriend always bother you.
If your husband, or boyfriend always ignore you.
Call them to play the game together.

Key Notes:
Dominoes Puzzle Science style is a completely free game, without any paid links.
Dominoes Puzzle Science style is a game that does not require a network, you can disconnect online play.

Apology statement:
Although it is a free game, but we also need to run our company, so there is advertising.
Apologize for advertising again.
If the ad is annoying to you, there will be no advertisement for disconnecting your network.

descriptionHTML:
Run, dodge, jump, and slide into an incredible pet adventure.
Leo Catomy is a brave and spiteful cat that as the habit of getting himself in trouble. Your task will be to make him escape from the angry dog.
Rush through crowded cities, small villages, over big bridges and gather all the coins you can. 
While running, avoid hitting trucks, cars, buses or any other object that could either slow you down or stop you. Collect all the fun power ups to get further and to give the tireless dog the slip.
Forget the subway stations, temple and jungles - the world run of Cat Subway Run await you!

Cat Subway Run is one of the 841 best free 3D running games! If you love running games, cat games, funny games or cat simulator games then you will love the free and cool Cat Subway Run game. Try it out and download Cat Subway Run now!

How to play Cat Subway Run :
- Drag/swipe to jump or slide/sub down to move down and swipe left/right to move left or right
- The power ups are activated automatically when you get them
- Buy new characters and upgrade power ups with the collected coins
- Try to dash so fast that you can smash the sonic wall ;-)

Features:
- 9 Lovely cats to choose - for example cat Lea or Leo well known from Talking Cat Leo or Cat Theme Park
- 2 run play mode: levels and infinite
- Cartoon like environment with Leo Catomy
- Amazing power-ups: coin magnet, rocket, super go kart, jetpack, etc.
- Trucks, cars and buses to avoid!
- Lots of obstacles to dodge or sub
- Dancing Girl and the despicable Tom the thief who will steal your collected coins
- Cool music
- Quality from Wonderful Gamesag

Special power- ups:

- The rocket will make you fly at top speed over the obstacles and give you the opportunity to collect a lot of coins.

- The Go kart will makes you faster which will require all of your dodging abilities to not crush against something. If you hit something with the kart you will only lose the vehicle but still keep running.

- The super spring sneaker gives you the ability to make mega jumps and escape dangerous situations for some seconds.

You can buy stronger sport cars and replace the go-kart with the collected gold coins.

If you like Cat Subway Run: Leo Cat vs Dog, please rate it with 5 stars on the store and invite your friends on facebook or google plus to join the race.

If you search for funny cat games for girls, crazy cat games for boys or best cat games for kids then Cat Subway Run - Subway Fun is the right game for you! Download it now and have a lot of fun!

This funny app with Leo Catomy has been created by Wonderful Gamesag.

descriptionHTML:
■ Survival mode unlocked!
■ New items, stages and zombies!
■ Adjusted difficulty level.

■ Synopsis
Once an ordinary man, Peter is left to survive in midst of a zombie apocalypse. As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.
Your job is simple - survive.

■ Features
Kill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!

Simply tap to fire your gun.
Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.

Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.

Experience this simple, yet strategic game!

■ Info
You can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.
There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.
Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.
Kill zombies for Gold. Use the Gold to upgrade teammates and maintain the camp.
Offensive or deffensive? It all depends on your choice.
As days pass zombies become stronger, and they will become even more powerful during night time.
Collect various inventory items for additional strength.
It's a good idea to check the type of item each Boss yields.
Mine is a very powerful weapon with devastating damage.
When barricade is breached, zombies can attack your teammates.
Nuke will restart the game, but you'll keep inventory items.
When you have an inventory item, obtain another identical item to upgrade it.
If the game is too hard, try again from the start with your inventory items by using Nuke.
There's a massive Last Boss waiting for you.

■ This game saves player data in device. Deleting the app will terminate all save data.

descriptionHTML:
Take to the slopes, ice-rinks, and snow in this winter sports-themed edition of Flick Champions. Choose a nation to represent in seven winter sports including Slalom, Ski Jumping, Ice Hockey and more.

GO FOR GOLD
Pick a country and lead them to victory. Master the art of flicking to win the gold trophy in 18 challenging cup events. Alternatively, create your own Olympic playlists in Champ mode.

GET YOUR SKATES ON
Try your fingers at eight chilly events including Slalom, Skating, Ski Jumping, Ice Hockey, Curling Snowball fight, Biathlon and Sledges.

comments: Relaxing - challenging, love the graphics Update: I was recently out of town and happened to check my bank account thoroughly for something else - I found all kinds of charges I didn't make but came from this game. It came to my attention because I didn't have time to play, not to mention I don't care how long it takes to pass a level so rarely pay for anything to pass a level. LOTS of unauthorized charges - I'm speechless and just sick. Had to cancel my card. I'll NEVER submit a card number for a game again - unless it's a throwaway visa - it would be the only way I would purchase in the future. Its a fun game -  DONT  let them into your account. Just...dont.

This used to be my favorite match 3 game of all, but lately every level is impossible unless you get JUST the right amount of luck in the gems that fall. I'll give it a few more tried and then I'm uninstalling it.
After 4hrs got to level 6 & couldn't even get close to progressing further. Seemed no point in playing the same level over & over & over again so I quit, you win (but you lost me)

I had rated it 5 stars even though it's tough to pass some levels. It took me more than a year to get to the 18-20th house & then an update sent me back to the beginning. :-( I don't play much anymore.

... UPDATE ON 3-1-2018 ... Was 5 star now 1. In my best Dalek voice UN--IN--STALL!!! Not sure which update did it, but this game that was one incredible is now slow as molasses! Each move painstakingly takes about 5 seconds for the gems to fall. I'm completely bummed. üòï

Slow and impossible. Yon need to collect items to move forward.  To collect items you need to beat the same previous level over and over. Just completing a level once is a major achievement. Got bored uninstalled

descriptionHTML:
ALL LIGHT is a connection puzzle game that will exercise your brain as Brain Teasers and improve your creativity by solving each puzzle. Test yourself. ;)


[HOW TO PLAY]
• Link the battery to the light bulbs to turn them ON!
• Connect bulbs (lamps) with battery to turn on them.
• Turn on all bulbs by connecting with energy source to solve each puzzle.
• Each bulb shows the number of wires required to turn it on.
• A red light bulb means that the wires are connected more than necessary.
• Just tap the line to remove the wire.


[FEATURES]
• Simple but innovative linking puzzle!
- Playing is as simple as just touching the screen.
- Challenge the higher packages that will gradually get harder!

• Play without any limit or restriction!
- No lives or No energy.
- Follow your own pace and enjoy freely this linking puzzle as much as you want!

• Simple and Intuitive Design
- Men and Women of all ages can enjoy this game. Feel the satisfaction of the lights turning ON.

- Very light on your device! Download Now!
- No need to use internet data while playing. Enjoy this linking puzzle whenever and wherever.

Hey guys! We have come up with a fantastic mermaid's love story. The mermaid lives in a castle deep in the sea. A group of friends came here for fishing. But unfortunately, they capture the innocent mermaid. Mermaid feels so disappointed after what happened to her. She wants to get out of there. But How? Then she remembered her birthday present. The witch has given her a magical ring to get human's legs. But the ring is not on her finger then where is the ring? She found the ring and uses it to have legs like the human and get out of there.

After getting human's legs she went to meet the prince who captured her in the aquarium cage. Prince falls in love with her in short time. Carol and Prince went on a date. Prince proposed to her but she rejects it and reveals that she was just taking revenge. What will happen next in this amazing story of mermaid rescue? To know, play this mermaid rescue game and have lots of fun.

comments: Great app. Would really like a tab of all the puzzles you've completed in one place. Please add!! That would be great! Unfortunately last 2 times I've started a puzzle it doesn't save my progress. I've gotten to 80% and 40% complete on the same puzzles & it didn't save my progress. Had to restart the same puzzle twice now. I haven't started a new puzzle since. Don't want to waste my time redoing puzzles I've already done just because my progress wasn't saved. Very frustrating. Before this it was a great app!

You guys did a wonderful job on this game. The only thing I don't like is how expensive it is to unlock everything. But I'll settle for the 5 dollar make my own jigsaw puzzles out of my own pictures. And I'll add in closing the pictures you already have available is excellent! Keep up the good work!

Since the latest update game keeps freezing up so have to uninstall and reinstall constantly. Or an ad pops up freezes game and same thing. Also points I've earned keep disappearing. It will say 3 when I open the game. Play 1 game and go back to select another and it says I have 0 points when it should say 2. This happens way too often. I love this game but very frustrated with it right now. I love the pictures, ther game layout, ease of play and all the options. Please fix these problems. Thanks!!
The game is great, I love the tools it gives you like being able to see a ghost image of the finished puzzle.  BUT the advertisements make it lag so bad I have to turn my phone to airplain mode.

It's fun and addictive. However, lately I've been getting flashing after working on a puzzle for a few minutes and have to shut it down it's so distracting. Also, lately the ads go in a loop; after watching the video, it goes to the game to add, then back and forth, endlessly sometimes.
Since the new update I am unable to play.  It will not load a puzzle, just gives a message that puzzle has stopped, do you want to report.  Unable to report.

description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

comments: I love decorating the rooms but I am having to pay too much to get enough points to do it.   I also don't like that each room requires more points to do the tasks than the previous room.  I have changed my rating to low because you end up spending too much of your own money to get powerful to get your stars to complete the tasks.  They also lose your purchases.  I bought a desk chair yesterday and now it is missing and the task is gone too.  Rip off.

This game is awesome. But the stars, please increase the amount of star not just 1. Make it 2 for the Hard Level. And lastly, it's hard to download new rooms when it always appear the Technical Error. Better if you do not require to download it and the user can open it without connecting to internet. However, the game is great for relaxing. Keep up the good work!

Never thought it would be this addictive! At first i thought "Oh, its THAT game that always pops up in advertisements." but after deciding to give it a try, i am hooked!   I introduced homescapes to my mom as well and downloaded it for her and she finds it adorable and fun as well. We both take time to chill out and have fun with the puzzles occasionally when we are together.   I cant find a single flaw or critique for this game, its amazing :)

Veeery enjoyable game! I feel like it's advertised too much, but it's definitely worth playing. Especially if you love games like Bejeweled!  Some of the levels are unnecessarily difficult to get by. You have to either get lucky, or be some type of strategic genius to pass them within a good time frame. That's slightly disappounting. Its too much of an encouragement to use money.

Homescapes is an awesome game, combining the relaxation (and frustration!) of match 3 games with the joy of renovating a fabulous mansion. Throw in the fascinating story line, lovable characters lovely music and stunning graphics (except the kitchen wallpaper lol), I'll be playing this for a long time! I'm working on the living room right now, getting close to level 600. Can't wait to see what the new character, Jerry, has in store for us! Thank you Playrix!

I really like this Game so Far. I will play for awhile to See how it Works & If I like it. Absolutely Love Your Game. Play it ALL THE TIME!!! I Must Admit that I Really Do enjoy this Game! Sometimes I find myself Having a Hard Time With Certain Levels. I Could be On that Level for Days or a Few Weeks. I think with Some Improvement that Would make People Play. This Game More. But I Must Say Hat's Off to The Developers
description: Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in‚Äîadventures await you from the moment you walk in the door! Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home! The game features:‚óè Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!‚óè Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.‚óè Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!‚óè A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!‚óè Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.‚óè A cute pet: meet –∞ naughty and fluffy cat.‚óè Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house! descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door!

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

The game features:

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.
● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!

Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com

‚Ä¢ A new part of the storyline: create your dream garage and fix a retro car

title: Homescapes

Drive through the huge city without limits and assist other police officers with their police duty!Explore the city chasing criminals with a range of unlockable British police cars! Turn on the police sirens and switch between multiple siren sounds! Once you're finished in the city you can head offroad or visit the dockyard to find more criminals!Not ready to fulfil your duty as a police officer? No problem! The streets are yours to explore, perform extreme stunts, drifts, jumps and rolls! Drive your police car to its limits with soft body car damage causing huge city destruction as you smash through signs and street lamps!Police Car Driving vs Street Racing Cars Features:- Multiple high speed British police cars to unlock!- Fun & easy to control driving physics!- Realistic soft body vehicle damage!- Destructible world with smashable signs, lamps and more!- Multiple realistic police sirens with stinger, wail and yelp modes!- Multiple dynamic camera angles giving you the best driving experience!- Optional full controller support!- Play on the go with your tablet/phone or play at home on Android TV!- Realistic traffic driving around the city!- Offroad area, huge city and dockyard areas of the map to explore!- Drive multiple cars from the Police Turbo DX, Police Sports Cruiser, Police SUV or Police Moonhawk!Become a real policeman as you chase criminals, stop street racing and explore the city in your own range of UK police cars! descriptionHTML:
Police car driving like you've never seen before with high speed pursuits chasing street racing cars! Take down the speeding race cars and put a stop to the illegal street racing.

Police Car Driving vs Street Racing Cars is free to play with minimal annoying ads!

The street racers have taken over the streets and it's up to you to put a stop to their dangerous driving before somebody gets hurt! Drive through the huge city without limits and assist other police officers with their police duty!

Explore the city chasing criminals with a range of unlockable British police cars! Turn on the police sirens and switch between multiple siren sounds! Once you're finished in the city you can head offroad or visit the dockyard to find more criminals!

Not ready to fulfil your duty as a police officer? No problem! The streets are yours to explore, perform extreme stunts, drifts, jumps and rolls! Drive your police car to its limits with soft body car damage causing huge city destruction as you smash through signs and street lamps!

- Multiple high speed British police cars to unlock!
- Fun & easy to control driving physics!
- Realistic soft body vehicle damage!
- Destructible world with smashable signs, lamps and more!
- Multiple realistic police sirens with stinger, wail and yelp modes!

description: The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!How to Play:- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded. - At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles  to get higher score Features: + easy operation but lots of fun.+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.+ Different roles dress+ Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly+ A combination of multiple bubbles	+ No wifi can also playif you like bubble shooting game,It is worth to try. Let's play it!
descriptionHTML:
The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!
How to Play:
- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.
- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.
- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.
- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.
- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded.
- At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles to get higher score
Features:
+ easy operation but lots of fun.
+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.
+ Different roles dress
+ Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly
+ A combination of multiple bubbles
+ No wifi can also play
if you like bubble shooting game,It is worth to try. Let's play it!
summary: Classic and funny bubble shooting game. all free.
title: Bubble Shooter

comments: I paid the 2 odd dollars to remove the ads since i really enjoyed the game. If you are thinking about doing the same DON'T. Paying the money removes ZERO ads. It simply allows you to skip most of them after 5 to 10 seconds rather than watching the whole 20 to 30 second ad. They still pop up just as often and are just as annoying. Personally I would wait for another developer to make a good clone of the game, shouldn't take long it's a simple engine.

I paid the price to get the ads removed, because I like to support developers and because there were a LOT of ads. The ads were never removed. I have contacted the developers more than once and received no response. Then I contacted the Play Store and they rejected my claim. Now I have paid for the ads to be removed and they are still there at a level that makes the game unplayable. Worst customer service ever; what a waste of money. I will remember this developer and never download another of their apps.

Terrible game. I can't pay twice without having to sit through a full 30 second add. I found it faster to exit out the app and go back in to avoid adds. But there are just too many adds that it made it not fun after the first few goes.

WAY TOO MANY ADS! Its so frustrating that after three failures an ad plays for 30 seconds. Also, why are you asking for access to my storage and location and the ability to make and receive calls? As a developer, get with what your customers want. Then I'll consider buying something.

Far too many ads. One here and there is understandable but after every single try, you get an add. Definitely uninstalled for that reason. As far as the game itself, it's really fun and could be addicting but I spent more time trying to get through the ads than I did playing the game.

EDIT TO PREVIOUS REVIEW: I PAYED FOR AD FREE AND REINSTALLED IT AND NO LONGER HAVE AD FREE!  I loved basically all of it except... If you don't buy ad free the game is completely unbearable with how many ads there are. Also I absolutely hate how it kicks me out of the challenges after I die if I tap too many times or I hold the screen while waiting for it to load.

descriptionHTML:
The high-powered action adds to the excitement of the game. In the game, the world seems to transform into a battlefield and you become the warrior.

In the introduction of the game, the entire town spot an alien in the sky. The enforcement officers have issued a warning to everyone for staying inside the door. As an experiment snaps wrong, you get max powers which many people believe to be a threat. Many terrorist groups come to prove their powers and eliminate yours and have to exhaust your life under the high protection of Government.

As you enter the world of danger and mess, you have highly powerful enemies to face. You collect various perks and blocky weapons during the fight.

Mission Timers
Collect weapons and perks

comments: It was a good game, until new update. The car body now go to scrap and not in the selling list, thus reduced the profit earning. Also in buildings needs to be repaired, materiap required is of huge quantity. Graphics needs to be better. Game play is easier to understand. Also in bank no complete cash statement is available, like complete diamond spend statement is available and not cash one.  Will surely give 5 star after fixing above points

So far, not bad.  Update:  gathered enough parts to repair the university and it won't unlock.  I emailed the developer and haven't heard back.  It is such a cool concept with little to no support or point.  Why gather the materials if we can't use them?  Plus, it took weeks to get the stuff.  Like most cool games, nothing more than a good concept.

You had my attention, and now you have my money. Yes, this is a good game. However, it costs too much real money to advance this game. There are many missing pieces and too much to acquire to be able to progress. Maybe instead of making it so in depth, take it down a notch. Let people use junked cars to fix cars and sell them, if this is already an option make it easier to do so. I think this is a good game just too in depth and not enough give to make it entertaining and fun at this time.

Great time killer... Love it so far and only been playing since yesterday... Already level 11 and got quite a few things however I gave 4 stars because I spent 10 diamonds on the bank which showed the stock market but didn't tell me it was coming soon until I paid for it... I like that this game doesn't make you pay real cash and gives you tokens just to win more cash, diamonds, energy etc so please don't ruin the game in the future and make us pay 2 play =)

The game is over good. It's definitely fun for your car enthusiasts but I am now level 11 and I can't obtain "glass" to build any buildings... The game is getting boring because I can't move up, it's pretty much scrap cars and sell parts... I don't want to rate this game too high because I believe it still is a work in progress, but yes it's a good game and I would recommend it

It's a decent concept. Good time killer for a little while. I don't know why all these games take energy. Just let me play the damn game. And the constantly fluctuating prices to sell the parts got old REAL QUICK! Apparently the creators of this game have never been to a salvage yard in their life.
description: Want to start your own vehicle business? If you love vehicles and automobiles, you will love this virtual business game of vehicles. It is unique and extremely entertaining.Junkyard Tycoon is a game where you start your own garbage garage, buy vehicles or vehicle parts, detach vehicle parts, sell them and make profit. While you slowly make good business out of junk vehicle parts, you become a junkyard tycoon.Just keep buying and selling vehicles or vehicle parts. The twist of the game is that you can make profit while selling different vehicle parts. You can buy Car,Truck,Motorbike,Boats  at scrapyard prices and you will be able to sell vehicle parts individually to make good money. It is a perfect way to test your business and money making skills. ‚ÄúJunkyard Tycoon‚Äù is the best time management game for unlimited fun and salvage yard business.The game is all about right set of Wreckers business skills needed at the right time.! Get ready for the most amazing vehicle business game where you can buy junk cars, trucks, vans, or any other moving parts of vehicles and test your business skills to become a real Magnate. Focus and play carefully! This is an amazing business strategy game.Decide on your business strategy to balance out your income and expenses. The Wrecking Yard economy game is really fun with thrilling sound effects and beautiful game graphics. Download the game and start your own Scrapheap Challenge.************************SAY HELLO************************We are constantly working hard on making the ‚ÄúJunkyard Tycoon‚Äù game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the game, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

comments: Good, comedic, unique clicker.  This game is a specimen all on it's own. It is a clicker game, but has so many non-clicker features that just make it such a good game. For one, the *characters*. It constantly remembers that you go back in time, as well as their memories. You have the smart and the not-so-much. It makes for a comedic experience, which brings me to my next point. It is *FUNNY*. It mixes in the comedic touch lacked by...everything. With what else is going on, it is laughable! Which brings me to my final point. It has a great *story*! It ties in sometung devilish going on in the background.  But is there a setting to remove Tucker reminding you about his planet core chunk shop?

This started our amazing. And then got really boring. Like after the 5th loop and they said I needed to do 23 more... same planets, same upgrades... love the story it's just boring. So I came to the reviews. Other people lasted longer than I did. I'm installing but I DID enjoy it while it was fun.

If you like "Cookie Clicker", and other clicker games, this has a similar gameplay style, collecting melons by clicking to plant then spending melons to speed up your profits. However, what kept me going was the simple, but fun "Story". Basically, after playing 3 Planetary systems, you time travel and repeat the process in a time loop, with the characters learning from their past time. This was fun and funny at first, and I was promised to be able to escape the loop after about five or ten loops, it was a tough but satisfying grind. However, when told I'd need to then repeat the loop 32 times . . . I uninstalled. If you like these repetitive clicker toys, this is worth it, but as addicting as this is, I lost interest after seeing the same 25 or so planets repeating that many times.
I thought each loop would be different, but after the 4th time, nothing new. After about four more loops, I gave up. It started out fun, but then it became a chore.

Good game but would like some more dialog when going through the later loops as there is not much there to keep one interested and a way to turn Mellons in to core chunks but except for that is is great.
Since the tenth loop I have nothing to spend my melons on, I purchased all the skill and tool upgrades that can be bought with melons,  now I have 100b melons with only 24 mil per minute

descriptionHTML:
Our friend loves to eat. Exercise? Eh…not so much. And as you can see he’s a bit, well…overweight. Actually, he’s 507 lbs.

Alright, so he’s pretty fat. Did we mention he loves to eat?

The thing is – he wants to get fit! To do that he needs your help.

So be prepared to:

• Get your friend out of bed, and do some physical activities.
• Get him running on the treadmill, lifting weights, or maybe jumping rope and boxing.
• Make sure he gets enough food after the workout, and a good night's sleep to recover his stamina.
• And please – don't forget to have fun!

Other features include:

• Exercise tracking with Google Fit, so if you exercise in real life, your friend will lose weight in the game as well.
• Funny costumes for your friend, such as a basketball player, clown, soldier and more.
• Stunning graphics that make playing the game fun each time you pick up your phone.
• Share your friend's best moments and progress as he keeps losing weight!

Dare to take the challenge? Develop that perfect exercise diet that will really help your friend shed those pounds.
developerAddress:
Dorado Oeste, Betania
Panama City, Panama
summary: Help your friend get Fit!
title: Fit the Fat 2

comments: Bloody amazing, like that's the best way I can put it. Its good for idling but you can make real progress by tapping as well. The fact that all the upgrades are based of real things like space marines and aliens is just good. Add the good music and its almost perfect. Only thing that I don't like is how the all be it good music is just a loop so I usually just play it silent. Great game.

Great app and time waster. Currently saving up 100 Rainbow Triforces for the end cutscene. My only complaint is that the game is short. I'd love to see this game have more characters and trees added to it eventually. Other than that I won't hesitate to say that this is one of the best idle clicker games out there.

A bit weird that the game is called 'Project1_Android' on my phone, but apart from that, this game keeps me interested. I like how I can just keep it idle instead of upgrading the tap, and I can still progress alot. I find one thing weird, I don't keep the exact CPS when it's offline. Not sure if it's meant to be that way.

I beat the game and got the (warning: spoilers)    triforce after the rainbow one then reset. make a idle tree 3.0 with max level for every thing 100 or something. I AM LITERALLY THE BIGGEST FAN OF THIS GAME EVER!!!

It's an amazing game, but I might have found a bug or a glitch. When I went go play it from the shortcut, it was labled Project1_Android. I'm not sure if this is a glitch or not, but it spooked me a little bit.

This game is so awesome! I love the fact that I know all the characters and references in this game! I suggest everyone to at least beat this game once because then you can truly appreciate the thought that went into characters, trees and upgrades! On my second game now!

description: Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games in this colorful free-to-play game from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise! Adventure unfolds all around your island! ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS - Trade with other players using the trade boat - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands - Have too many pineapples?
