descriptionHTML:
Marvel Island was a magic place where block animals, superheroes, fantasy hopper characters and monsters lived together. However, one day, the volcano, placed near to the road, exploded and some of the animals and characters become blocky Road Creepers. These Marvel Island creatures, damned by the lava, acquired the power of making explode whatever... or whoever. Their plan: A hostile takeover of Marvel Island to find the hidden diamond treasure to raise a great crossy monster army!
The whole humanity is at risk if this treasure falls into the wrong hands! Take all the diamonds before the blocky Road Hopper Creepers reach them and become the greatest pixel hero in this survival arcade blocky adventure!

The funniest endless arcade block survival racing simulator game, with crossy retro style!
Explore the island and dodge all the crossy creepers in a survival horror race simulator full of creepy crossy monsters... Try the new online mode for multiplayer vs single matches!

BE PART OF MORE THAN 5 MILLION PEOPLE who have already done an endless hopper exploration in blocky Marvel Island!
Jump into this arcade multiplayer racing game and compete against your friends! Unlock all crossy characters: Select your favorite pets, superheroes and the most popular skins and start avoiding crossy Creepers, who are trying to dominate this road block fantasy world.

NEW: PLAY ONLINE - SINGLE MODE OR MULTIPLAYER!
- Endless rematch possibilities when you play online in this survival block pixel adventure!
- Play online... Your friends will see your skins! Defend your road hopper pixel hero against horror monsters and block animals!
- Rankings by trophy. Beat records with the help of the Smashy Catapults!

FEATURES OF THIS SURVIVAL PIXEL ADVENTURE SIMULATOR - BLOCKY SUPERHEROES VS ROAD CREEPERS & MONSTERS
- 137 fantasy block superheroes to unlock. Use weapons, powers of characters and Smashy Catapults!
- Tap, hop, jump, race and swipe your way to a record-setting number of steps avoiding blocky road creepers and obstacles!
- Editable craft skins: Become an crossy animal, a superhero, a skeleton or a famous crossy character in this simulator!
- Monsters multiplayer mode: Challenge your friends in this action-packed crossy adventure hopper game!
- Explore 12 block terrains! New: Happy City, Apocalyptic Town, Crowded Stadium, Endless Castle.
- Almost all the skins have special abilities. Beat spooky Road Creepers monsters with them!
- Explore in this retro block style survival adventure and run with your block hopper skins against obstacles and monsters!
- Stunning retro style block graphics!

A racing hopper survival online multiplayer superheroes game with an endless crossy style exploration in an amazing horror challenging block world full of creepers and monsters.
Play single matches or online crossy multiplayer games and beat the scores of your friends with your pixel hero in this arcade block adventure!
The blocky road creeper conflict between monsters and superheroes of Marvel Island has just started! Are you ready?

comments: I'm loving these updates really bring more life to the game. The new car is really fun because it can flip over really easy. Please don't change that. A few suggestions: When you go to winter wonderland you can't go back. Would be cool if car panels would become detached like the hood or the trunk. Adding a police cruiser would be cool too. I like the breakable rear lights on some of the cars. Maybe add deflatable tires? Very good game all in all

Need a 67 Shelby mustang gt 500 fastback "Eleanor". Also needs a hand brake for sharp turns and drifting and maybe an inside view with steering wheel and stick shift. Very fun and addicting game. Great job here. Multi-player would be cool too.

This game is awsome!  Controls and graphics can be a little laggy,  but the large amount of tracks and cars to unlock and play around with makes up for it. My favorite car is the Duke Wagon Classic, nitro-charged, with a v-8 dropped into it.  Will kick butt in any race or derby! My only suggestion would be on the physics of the cars... Instead of having the bodies simply crush and get smaller/deformed, it would be cool to see body panels and  small pieces like lights and mirrors fall right off. Just a thought. Also it would be cool to have more big station wagon type cars.

This game is really fun and additive I play it EVERYDAY. This game is by far the best demolition derby game I,ve  played. For my free car I would like a lykan hypersport please!!! ;-) If you do not know what it is please look it up and please try to make it they are really cool, fast, and exotic cars. If not I would like tank. Thank you for reading.

Cool game! Good grapich! Nice control! Fun Game!  Well, this game need more jumpy track and smaller road for racing. Imagine if you race and the car jumping through the track. Idk why straight maps its not very fun to play. I want downhill track with ultra high jump im sure lot of epic moment will happened there   And jumpy map for derby mode with more obstacles and every maps must have its unique​ thing like falling rock or bouncy bomb im sure this will give more fun.  Car? I want the car have accessories like extra headlight, bumper or weapon? 20¬∞ arc ram in front of car will give more fun and and rear mirror and driver POV camera  Well, i want ice cream truck, the officially derby monster truck, hot wheels car and F1? :/

I had loved this game until it stopped saving my car purchases. Like my last  one the pick up that looks exactly like a 80s chevy with the cap off and roll cage. I put 7.0 motor in it with NOS tires and paint. Went in this morning it was gone. Please fix.Norton also says you're monitoring my location how obtrusive you dushbags.
description: - Banger Racing - Destruction Derby - Open World Driving - Upgrade & Customize Vehicles -Smash and Bang your way to the lead in this fun and exciting Demolition game inspired by Banger Racing and Destruction Derby races all around the world.With the great success of Circuit: Demolition Derby from Beer Money Games we wanted to keep adding new features to the game. descriptionHTML:
- Banger Racing - Destruction Derby - Open World Driving - Upgrade & Customize Vehicles -

Smash and Bang your way to the lead in this fun and exciting Demolition game inspired by Banger Racing and Destruction Derby races all around the world.

With the great success of Circuit: Demolition Derby from Beer Money Games we wanted to keep adding new features to the game. In fact we started adding so many more features it became an entirely new game!

Features Include:
• Free Drive mode
• City Traffic
• Police Chases
• 55 Race Tracks
• 10 Demolition Derby Arenas!
• 40 Unique Cars
• Engine Upgrades
• Add Boost To Each Car
• Custom Paint
• Wheel Changer
• Custom Window Tint
• Change Your Car Number
• Post Race and Demolition Replay

We want to hear from you! Please post a review and let us know any bugs and what feature or car you want us to add to the game next!

Instead of regular dress up games for teenage girls, try out something new and exciting, in the spirit of fall and winter holidays! It's time for the gala festivity with elegant costumes, or a spooky Halloween party with intricate face paint designs ‚Äì the choice is yours!
descriptionHTML:
🎆 Face Paint Costume Party Salon 🎆 invites all fashion dolls to throw a face painting party and perform the most epic beauty makeover on different superstar models! Be a style expert and help these girls put on makeup and fun costumes for their big night out on the town.

💖 Whether you’re heading to a fun costume party or enjoying a night at a fair or carnival, there’s no reason not to look like a fashion diva, fresh out of the red carpet fashion show! We bring makeup and dressup games to a new level with our fashion makeover care salon - "free face paint games" for all fashion girls!

💖 Make a bold fashion statement with this fashion show makeover - girls game! This incredible "face paint salon" game offers you an abundance of face paint designs, as well as a full fashion makeover experience!

- 3 fashion queens to style and dress up! Pick one and give her an amazing "beauty makeover"!
- 3 different salons – beauty spa, face paint and dress up salon!
- Beauty salon – get the model ready for a big face paint party! Clean her face and make it a perfect canvas for face painting. Remove dirt, dark under eye circles and pimples! Then, apply a face mask to finish off the incredible day at the beauty spa for princesses!
- 8 different face paint categories - animals, butterflies, princess, eye masks, stars, carnival art, flowers, underwater world!
- Choose a hairstyle, hair color, hair accessories and jewelry for the beauty queen!
- Dress up salon – mix and match corsets, skirts, shirts, pants, dresses, bags, socks and shoes!
- Accessorize your costume with bracelets, earrings, headbands and more!
- Download 🎆 Face Paint Costume Party Salon 🎆 FREE!

💖 The masquerade ball that you got invited to tonight has an awesome face paint theme! Can you wow the crowd with your creativity by combining the cutest face paint design with the right dress, makeup look and hairstyle? Choose among various designs of face masks in our face painting salon – there are fantastic designs of different colors and shapes, with rhinestones, sparkles and more! Beauty salon games with levels are great fun, but ours has a special twist – it's a face paint party salon with the coolest carnival parade outfits!

💖 From makeup to costumes, there are tons of ways to mix and match clothing items, hairstyles and makeup and let your creativity shine! With 🎆 Face Paint Costume Party Salon 🎆 you'll become the top costume designer in town!

💖 Dress up world games and party games for girls have never been this much fun! Instead of regular dress up games for teenage girls, try out something new and exciting, in the spirit of fall and winter holidays! In our fashion store, you'll find only the trendiest clothing pieces!

💖 Face paint salon and fashion boutique for stylish divas – all in one makeup and dress up game for girls who dream of being runway fashion models one day! Prove that you've got a knack for colors, patterns and shapes, and turn the girls into superstars ready for the biggest costume party of the year!

💖 So many fabulous top models are invited to join this fashion "face paint party" tonight and they have to look their best. It doesn't matter if it's a Halloween party, Christmas party or a simple house party with costumes, your costume has to be amazing – the same goes for your makeup and hair!

💖 Surprise everyone at the masked ball with the most outrageous "princess face paint" ever seen! Your costume will light up the entire festival, so hurry up, get your costume and face paint ready and start the fiesta!

💖 Download 🎆 Face Paint Costume Party Salon 🎆 and prepare your runway fashion girls for the biggest face paint party! It's time for the gala festivity with elegant costumes, or a spooky Halloween party with intricate face paint designs – the choice is yours!
summary: Amazing beauty salon game with a twist ‚Äì dress up for the big costume party!

comments: This game is very fun and addicting. My only complaint is there isn't enough variation in the astromons. Some of them you can tell they are based off of a certain elemental character that's say...water but then the fire version is the same looking just red instead of blue. It's strange. Maybe change up how they look a bit more like in Pokemon with all of eevee evolutions. But then again it's a free game and I have been having a blast playing it. Thank you.

As a beginner in the game, all the interaction menus and stuff you need to get to, or just wanna check out, take way to long to get to, as they're complicated and hold a lot of the game in them. It'd be great if there were an easier way to figure out what they do, to get the most out of the game as a newbie, instead of going through 30 tutorials of their own to find out. Otherwise, I love the gameplay, characters, and art. Great game all in all.

Please fix the constant crashing during clan battles. Other than that its a wonderful games. Also it's becomes harder get gold as you level up which sucks. I love the game. Cute astromon, Wonderful evolutions, and even a nice story!

so I have been playing this game for awhile now and the only major flaw I have found is that if you choose to pay for astrogems they are ridiculous expensive for pretty much nothing. I understand it is probably so it doesn't come as a pay to win game but ya. Also I wish appearance rates for rares and up for better.  I love this game. Really not an understatement. It's the perfect time killer and for me I doesn't get old. The only thing I would change is on the hard and extreme levels I wouldn't have the astromon revert to their original forms after you catch them.

Its really fun to play! I've had it for  4 days now and everyday you can spend at least 2 hours playing without it being boring AT ALL! I really like this game and hope that it will be updated for a long time. (I only wanted to say: Could you come up with a better name? At this point putting super in the name of a game doesn't really make it sound to great... When I see a game with super in the title I expect it to be awful or OK but not really fun. So seeing as I feel that this name does not represent the game well I would like to ask you to reconsider to a more attractive name.) Thanks for readingüëç.

It's nice overall. But you gotta spend a lot if you want 5 star units. I already did 3-4 600 gem summons and everytime they just give you 1 4stars unit the rest are 2 and 3 stars even when they say 'chances up'.

Collect over 550 types of Astromon in Monster Super League! # I Choose You!Catch wild Astromons out there in the field, or summon them by hatching the mysterious eggs!Collect & evolve your favorite Astromons!# Evolve and Grow!Your Astromons will evolve to change in looks and gain additional skills.Sometimes, they will evolve into very rare variants with even more power!# Strategic Combat!Even the same Astromons can differ by attributes & combat style.Build your team to adventure through over 100 stages in various natural environments!# Populate your Airship!Astromons you catch & summon get to live on your airship.Sometimes you might even have a surprise visitor! # Socialize with friends!Summon your friends from all around the world to chat and exchange gifts and tips! # Become stronger in your own way!Collect Astromons with different attributes to build your own best team.Grow your Astromons faster by feeding fruits, and unlock additional powers with special runes! # Immersive Content!Dive deep into the story of Astromons through 8 different regions!Challenge yourself in daily Dungeons for better rewards! descriptionHTML:
# Adventure with the Astromons!
Monster Super League summons you to the fantasy world of Astromons!
From cute to stylish, catch & collect monsters of all sizes and shapes!
Collect over 550 types of Astromon in Monster Super League!

# I Choose You!
Catch wild Astromons out there in the field, or summon them by hatching the mysterious eggs!
Collect & evolve your favorite Astromons!

# Evolve and Grow!
Your Astromons will evolve to change in looks and gain additional skills.
Sometimes, they will evolve into very rare variants with even more power!

# Strategic Combat!
Even the same Astromons can differ by attributes & combat style.
Build your team to adventure through over 100 stages in various natural environments!

# Populate your Airship!
Astromons you catch & summon get to live on your airship.
Sometimes you might even have a surprise visitor!

# Socialize with friends!
Summon your friends from all around the world to chat and exchange gifts and tips!

# Become stronger in your own way!
Collect Astromons with different attributes to build your own best team.
Grow your Astromons faster by feeding fruits, and unlock additional powers with special runes!

# Immersive Content!
Dive deep into the story of Astromons through 8 different regions!
Challenge yourself in daily Dungeons for better rewards!
Battle against other players in the Astromon League!

Access requests for gameplay (Game services restricted if disabled)
1) Only for game installation purposes, this application requests access to external memory.

▷Monster Super League Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/monstersuperleague
Follow up on the latest news and events on the Monster Super League official community!

Started off with one ticket, then I got another ten, then after a few more spins got another ten tickets, after that I got a few other things like coins and cars, then got more tickets and so on. I got all the cars with the tickets from spinning the wheel and I have so much money now, and I don't know what to do with it, I have already got all the cars. It is a fun game it just needs some improvement that's all. I have around 60000 coins and 70 tickets
Thanks for the auto reply, idiots! Big coins don't count towards total? Bought a double coin car and the large coins which I believe are supposed to be worth 10 don't add coins at all.

Fun game, annoying ads I was having fun with the game but the ads are intrusive to the point of frustration. I uninstalled it after the fourth noisy video ad popped up in about 5 minutes of play. The only option to remove ads is to buy a car that costs over $20. If there were an option to pay$1 - $5 to remove ads, or if the ads weren't so loud while I have the game on silent, I would have been happy. Fun, simple game, but if I have the game sounds off, the ads should be silent too.

Repetitive and lots of ads. The idea is good. The graphics look nice. But a full 20 second advertisement video after EVERY round.. That got annoying pretty quick! Also there is not much variation.. You just go in circles.. and go.. and go.. and..

No Challenge after unlocking everything Bug bug bug...big coins which come up as game progresses don't add to the total coin collection... Also the last car which u unlock which has double life & double coins feature has issue of scoring.. the total score does not pass "3" even though in actual u hav completed more than 3 rounds
description: The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car. Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
descriptionHTML:
The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!
New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!

As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.
Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car.
Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.
Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.
Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.
Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
developerAddress: RAK FREE TRADE ZONE BLDG PO 10055
summary: Race in circles at full speed, keep your eyes on other cars and do not crash!

comments: WOW. This game has everything! My only complaint is that the "earning" free in game currency section (downloading and playing other games to certain level), does not yield in game currency, so do not bother. Just pay for stuff when it goes on sale. But otherwise, WOW! This is like fanfic, sims, empire, battle, idle, all in one! Hpw often do you get an all in one game based off an amazing franchise?? (As of this date, ive been playing for 2 months, spent $10)

I know the update on The Book of Dragons came out a long time ago, but I still can't make sense of it. The old book of Dragons was a lot easier to understand. If you filtered it to show only searchable dragons, then it would show in order what you unlock. I'm not sure, but from what I understand is that the dragons are now arranged in time to search. That's neat and all, but could you please come out with a filter for dragon unlocsks by Lvl?  Dragons unlocked at a later Lvl is usually better. With the current filter, you can find a dragon which collect 14 mill wood/hour with dragons collecting 1.05 mill wood because it is arranged by time to search. Again, please release a filter option by Lvl unlocked? Thanks for your help!

I really prefer  the old version of  this game like how you'd have a dragon and you'd guard a wagon and collect gold and fish and some time a new egg. And if a dragon attacked you'd battle it and have to tilt your tablet to fly aim you fire blasts.could you add a dragon racing minigame

I love it even if it's not real I don't care though and I think it could use an update about more dragons and more offers about coins and ruins but free ones cause no likes spending money on games unless they last forever so keep up that good work.  And one more update that the dragon and grand dragons like foreverwing and more but make them cheaper with ruins and what ever more .  And I love the game u should get it.

description: Build, upgrade and defend your very own medieval castle! descriptionHTML:
Build, upgrade and defend your very own medieval castle! Use strategy and command your army of holy knights to attack your enemies (or friends) and battle your way to glory in this new game - PaladinZ: Champions of Might!

PaladinZ is simple and easy to play, this game is a combination of strategy, magic, knights, and some funny jokes. It requires you plan how to protect your castle (don’t just build and upgrade everything you can in a random order) and plan your attacks carefully (just sending every knight you have won’t cut it) in order to win every battle and make your Lord - THE Lord of the Land.


Game Features:
✔ Build and upgrade your very own medieval castle
✔ Place your defences strategically and defend against other players’ attacks
✔ Watch out and protect your lands from the Poachers
✔ Train your army of funny characters - Spearmen, Archers, Witches, Griffons and more
✔ Upgrade and evolve your army into an unbeatable force
✔ Battle players worldwide and take their Gold, Food and Trophies
✔ Challenge your friends to see who has the best army and who is the better Lord
✔ Discover your favorite attack and defence forces from countless combinations of units
✔ Watch replays of every battle - Watch your holy army in battle to improve your strategy
✔ See how you compare to other players worldwide in Google Achievements and Ranking
✔ Knights & castles themed graphics and sounds with adorable, funny characters
✔ Free action charged strategy game - You have to have strategy in your attacks!
✔ Play as either a male or a female and command your army of holy knights to victory!


Join the PaladinZ Community and get updates, participate in competitions or just watch some funny videos of our holy knights:

Like us: https://www.facebook.com/PaladinZGame/


Terms of Service: http://www.spartonix.com/#/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.spartonix.com/#/privacy
summary: Build, upgrade, and fight your way to become the greatest Paladin there is!
title: PaladinZ: Champions of Might
